font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A man\nwith family and children going to school is vulnerable and afraid to blow the\nwhistle.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many\nhonest people have been forced into criminal acts . They keep quiet as they don\u2019t\nwant their family to be harmed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We must\nhave a law to protect people from reprisal for stepping forward to identify\nwrongdoing \u2014 even criminal acts \u2014 by their colleagues or superiors in\nbusinesses or government organizations.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">When I\nwas a young officer, FAKE Basmati rice was being exported to Russia via a Gujarat\nport in a nearby ship . &nbsp; When someone objected (false Bill of Lading ) &nbsp;, he was told to speak on the phone and on the\nother side was Sanjay Gandhi himself\u2014asking to lay off. &nbsp; The\nmiddle man ( trader representing Punjab govt &nbsp;) was a Sikh who was the langot yaar of my Sikh fourth\nengineer .&nbsp; We met this guy on a crowded street\nand we head a shout\u2014OOI OOI TEEEJVEEEERE&nbsp;\n! &nbsp;Next thing I saw was two sardars hugging in the middle of the street .\n&nbsp;And then he came on board the ship for a re-union drink. &nbsp;When he got drunk, I heard him telling this . &nbsp;Drunk people don\u2019t lie.&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whistle blowers\nare often viewed by their employers as \u201ctraitors\u201d to the organization.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They can\nbe subjected to harassment from their superiors or demoted to idle positions\nwhere they are effectively denied chances to engage in substantial work \u2014\npossibly lasting until they reach the mandatory retirement age.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">There\nwas another time when my Bangladesi officer told me that they have to pay the\nfirst months salary as bribe ( &nbsp;20% wages gone even before joining the\nship ). The top boss of this company was a Norwegian and he was my fan. &nbsp;I\ncalled him up, and he assured me that he would stop this corruption that very\nminute\u2014with whistle blower secrecy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Money\nearned at sea on Chemical tankers can be equated in blood, NOT sweat. &nbsp; It is\nhard earned .. You have NO idea what i mean ...<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now we\nhave Punjab school girls having convulsions as soon as they received the HPV\ninjections eight days ago. &nbsp; Parents are afraid to complain and Trojan Horse NGO\nmafia employed by EVIL PHARMA would threaten them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHISTLE BLOWERS MUST HAVE FAST TRACK JUSTICE . &nbsp;COLLEGIUM JUDGES CAN NEVER GIVE THIS.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THERE MUST BE POLITICAL WILL.&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today\nin India , many undertrials have been languishing without trial for two\ndecades. &nbsp; Some have been booby trapped ( fake rape cases ) and punished for speaking the truth. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Corrupt Judges keep giving TAREEQ after\nTAREEQ after TAREEQ . &nbsp;&nbsp;Court clerks are bribed to misplace the file\nor even destroy vital papers. &nbsp; &nbsp;Some of the highest paid Supreme court lawyers are experts in this .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHISTLE\nBLOWING AND TELLING THE TRUTH AS A PATRIOT AMOUNTS TO DEFAMATION. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">I\nMYSELF WAS SLAPPED WITH A DEFAMATION CASE BY A CRYING BOLLYWOOD SUPERSTAR.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\">AS\nSOON AS I WAS ARRESTED, &nbsp;I HAD A RETIRED SUPREME COURT JUDGE &nbsp;( WELL WISHER ) TELLING ME &nbsp; &nbsp; \u201c AJIT, NOTHING WILL HAPPEN TO YOU\u2014 YOU ARE A FAMOUS WRITER WITH TREMENDOUS REACH \u201d</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/11/donald-trump-for-president-part-3-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/11/donald-trump-for-president-part-3-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In USA,\nOSHA has a whistle blower act.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OSHA's\nWhistleblower Protection Program enforces the whistleblower provisions of more\nthan twenty whistleblower statutes protecting employees who report violations\nof various workplace safety and health, airline, commercial motor carrier,\nconsumer product, environmental, financial reform, food safety, health\ninsurance reform, motor vehicle safety, nuclear, pipeline, public\ntransportation agency, railroad, maritime, and securities laws. Rights afforded\nby these whistleblower protection laws include, but are not limited to, worker\nparticipation in safety and health activities, reporting a work-related injury,\nillness or fatality, or reporting a violation of the statutes herein.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nOSH Act prohibits employers from discriminating against their employees for\nexercising their rights under the OSH Act. These rights include filing an OSHA\ncomplaint, participating in an inspection or talking to an inspector, seeking\naccess to employer exposure and injury records, reporting an injury, and\nraising a safety or health complaint with the employer. If workers have been\nretaliated or discriminated against for exercising their rights, they must file\na complaint with OSHA within 30 days of the alleged adverse action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In India\nwe had criminals selling IRON TONIC in the market which is nothing but iron\nfilings in a sweet syrup. &nbsp; The iron filings get sucked up by using a magnet. &nbsp; After\nyou have such a tonic you die a painful death<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Now we\nhave the Modi Govt allowing Indians women to be used as guinea pigs for JEWISH\nEVIL PHARMA. &nbsp; Contraception injections\nare now being administered to women. &nbsp; DMPA is used by LIBERATED western women\nwho would like to eliminate regular menses.. This injection is used in the west\nby WH0RES who have HIV and are sexually active, they don\u2019t want earning days\nlost due to bleeding from their meal ticket between their legs &nbsp;.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As\nhuman beings with a sense of right and wrong, the need to point out or correct\nbehaviors is appropriate. &nbsp;How can we expect the world to be a better place if\nwe don't do our part to make it better?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the other hand, as an individual\nwith people counting on you, the thought of retribution or potentially losing\nyour job and facing a \u201cdefamation suit\u201d is enough to silence even the strongest\nof us. &nbsp; What rights do we have to speak up?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE DO\nHAVE A INEFFECTIVE WHISTLE BLOWER PROTECTION ACT IN INDIA.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS PROTECTS THE HIGH AND MIGHTY CRIMINALS ,\nRATHER THAN THE HONEST BUT VULNERABLE PERSON WHO BLEW THE WHISTLE.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3cPnCQP7S44/WD2R0shIJfI/AAAAAAABPb4/tLoy-P3dGRU7HWgNslIHIxB9FZ-T-4O0ACLcB/s1600/downEESload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3cPnCQP7S44/WD2R0shIJfI/AAAAAAABPb4/tLoy-P3dGRU7HWgNslIHIxB9FZ-T-4O0ACLcB/s400/downEESload.png\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whistle\nBlowers Protection Act, 2011 is an Act of the Parliament of India which\nprovides a mechanism to investigate alleged corruption and misuse of power by\npublic servants and also protect anyone who exposes alleged wrongdoing in\ngovernment bodies, projects and offices. &nbsp; The wrongdoing might take the form of\nfraud, corruption or mismanagement. The Act would also ensure punishment for\nfalse or frivolous complaints.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nAct was approved by the Cabinet of India as part of a drive to eliminate\ncorruption in the country's bureaucracy and passed by the Lok Sabha on 27\nDecember 2011.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Bill was passed by Rajya Sabha on 21 February 2014 and\nreceived the President's assent on 9 May 2014<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WITHOUT\nSECRECY THE WHISTLE BLOWER ACT WONT WORK.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An\nengineer, Satyendra Dubey, was murdered in November 2003; Dubey had blown the\nwhistle in a corruption case in the National Highways Authority of India\u2019s Golden\nQuadrilateral project.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Two\nyears later, an Indian Oil Corporation officer, Shanmughan Manjunath, was\nmurdered for sealing a petrol pump that was selling adulterated fuel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nKarnataka official SP Mahantesh, said to be a whistle-blower in controversial\nland allotments by societies was murdered in May 2012. Mahantesh was working as\nDeputy Director of the audit wing in the state\u2019s Cooperative department and had\nreported irregularities in different societies involving some officials and\npolitical figures. &nbsp;A senior police officer alleged that Mayawati's government\nwas corrupt and had embezzled large amounts of money. Shortly thereafter, he\nwas sent to a psychiatric hospital.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nAugust 2013, a bench of Justices K S Radhakrishnan and Arjan Kumar Sikri ruled\nthat identity of whistleblower can never be revealed to the accused facing\nprosecution under Prevention of Corruption Act, 1988. Yet somehow the DESH\nDROHI media , manages to get information and give it to the high and mighty\ncorrupt<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nJune 2011, a parliamentary panel recommended that ministers, the higher\njudiciary, security organisations, defence and intelligence forces and\nregulatory authorities be brought under the whistleblowers' protection bill to\ncheck corruption and the willful misuse of power.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Again --</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">- the bill was passed by the Lok Sabha on 27\nDecember 2011. The Bill was and by the Rajya Sabha on 21 February 2014. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nWhistle Blowers Protection Act, 2011 has received the Presidential assent on\nMay 9, 2014 and the same has been subsequently published in the official\ngazette of the Government of India on May 9, 2014 by the Ministry of Law and\nJustice, Government of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nact is just a \"paper tiger\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qUKpVjM3tM8/WD2SiAUZdyI/AAAAAAABPb8/tIaEaAc_J6A62HGgLVOS6DkEQLmLdx01QCLcB/s1600/imag888es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qUKpVjM3tM8/WD2SiAUZdyI/AAAAAAABPb8/tIaEaAc_J6A62HGgLVOS6DkEQLmLdx01QCLcB/s400/imag888es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even\ntwo years after the much-awaited Whistleblowers Protection Act came into existence,\nit was yet to be fully operational in the country.&nbsp; There is no concrete system to protect\nwhistleblowers in our country right now.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nproposed law has neither provisions to encourage whistleblowing (financial\nincentives), nor deals with corporate whistleblowers; it does not extend its\njurisdiction to the private sector (a strange omission, after the fraud at\nSatyam).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Directorate of Income Tax Intelligence and Criminal Investigation\nis one of the only agencies empowered for whistle blower protection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To\nencourage the fight against corruption, CVC has provided on their website, a\n\"Lodge Complaints Online\" &nbsp;portal. The earlier publicized portal Blow\nyour whistle is no longer functional.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WITHOUT\nSECRECY NOTHING WORKS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ou3Axz268IQ/WD2SuLvN4WI/AAAAAAABPcE/kWXGZ5mzHzAC4xTPdOxBYsiGXKykDjkIwCLcB/s1600/whistleblower-image_oliverff88-b_blog.jpg-100476453-primary.idge.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ou3Axz268IQ/WD2SuLvN4WI/AAAAAAABPcE/kWXGZ5mzHzAC4xTPdOxBYsiGXKykDjkIwCLcB/s320/whistleblower-image_oliverff88-b_blog.jpg-100476453-primary.idge.jpeg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE\nMUST BE ENOUGH MANPOWER TO DEAL WITH WHISTLE BLOWERS .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE ADVANTAGE IS ATLEAST SOMETHING IS ON\nPAPER , ON RECORD.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN TOO MANY PEOPLE\nTELL THE SAME THING, WE CAN USE OUR COMMONSENSE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">FOREIGN PAYROLL RTI ACTIVISTS\nMUST BE KEPT AWAY FROM WHISTLE BLOWERS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://www.indiacode.nic.in/acts2014/17%20of%202014.pdf\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.indiacode.nic.in/acts2014/17%20of%202014.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The risk\nof corruption is significantly heightened in environments where the reporting\nof wrongdoing is not supported or protected. &nbsp; Public and private sector employees\nhave access to up-to-date information concerning their workplaces\u2019 practices,\nand are usually the first to recognise wrongdoings. However, those who report\nwrongdoings may be subject to retaliation, such as intimidation, harassment,\ndismissal or violence by their fellow colleagues or superiors.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In many countries,\nwhistleblowing is even associated with treachery or spying.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whistleblower\nprotection is therefore essential to encourage the reporting of misconduct,\nfraud and corruption. &nbsp; Providing effective protection for whistleblowers\nsupports an open organisational culture where employees are not only aware of\nhow to report but also have confidence in the reporting procedures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\nalso helps businesses prevent and detect bribery in commercial transactions. The\nprotection of both public and private sector whistleblowers from retaliation for\nreporting in good faith suspected acts of corruption and other wrongdoing is therefore\nintegral to efforts to combat corruption, safeguard integrity, enhance accountability,\nand support a clean business environment.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE ALL\nKNOW THAT IN THE PAST TWO DECADES HARDLY ANY FOREIGN ARMS HAVE BEEN BOUGHT\nWITHOUT AT LEAST 20%- 35% &nbsp;COMMISSION\n.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ARMED\nFORCES BIG BRASS / POLITICIANS DON\u2019T WANT RUSSIAN ARMS ,&nbsp; AS RUSSIANS DO NOT PAY \u201cKICKBACKS \u201c LIKE\nWHITE SKINNED ZIONIST JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN AS\nMUCH AS RUSSIAN FIGHTER JETS WERE BEING SABOTAGED AND DELIBERATELY CRASHED .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/flying-coffin-mig-21-fishbeds-of-iaf.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/flying-coffin-mig-21-fishbeds-of-iaf.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India must\nprovide clear &nbsp;clear rules and procedures\nfor whistle-blowing, and take steps to ensure that those who report violations\nin compliance with stated rules are protected against reprisal, and that the\ncomplaint mechanisms themselves are not abused.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To\nencourage whistleblowing, a rewards systems, including monetary rewards, could\nbe included as part of the whistleblower protection mechanism.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nwhistleblower is the one who has the direct and personal information or leads\nwhich are very useful in an investigation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At sea\nFilipinos took advantage of USCG financial incentives and got many Indian Chief\nEngineers behind bars for MAGIC PIPE. Filipinos are the only nationality who\ntook advantage of a law to become rich\u2014by lying ( without proof ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I will vouch\nthat most Indian Chief Engineers are guilty of pumping heavy oil fuel sludge\noverboard, due to lack of incineration capacity or landing facility.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-magic-pipes-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-magic-pipes-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I\nquote item 31 in the post below-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201c 31)There\nis no proper water extraction facility for the HO sludge prior putting into the\nincinerator. This will cause sputtering and extinguishing of flame. And\nwhatever is extracted goes back to square one. Smooth incineration is a must or\nman hours are wasted.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AT SEA\nMY ENGINEER SHORE BOSSES HATED ME LIKE THE PLAGUE\u2014THEY DID NOT HAVE THE\nTECHNICAL BRAINS TO UNDERSTAND WHAT I WROTE IN MY EMAILS AND FAXES.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-purifiers-and-clarifiers.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-purifiers-and-clarifiers.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THAT\nIS WHY WHEN I DECIDED TO MOVE ON, &nbsp;THEY\nWOULD HAVE A PARTY AND GET DRUNK \u201cBACHCH GAYA SAALA \u201c<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lack\nof trust in the ability or willingness of the authorities to investigate the\nreport is one of the biggest deterrents to reporting wrongdoings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We the\npeople , demand that the Modi government must put in place an administrative\nmechanism for their protection as they face threats and harassment for bringing\nto light irregularities in government departments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nWhistleblowers Protection law has been still pending in Parliament for years\u2014the\npoliticians don\u2019t want it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The concept of whistleblower is a\nglobal phenomenon and has become a reality. &nbsp; They will be there and the\ngovernment cannot wish it away.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nVyapam scam or the Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPPEB) scam\nas it is better known has been making headlines for one reason \u2013 more than 40\npeople associated with the scam have died since the story broke in 2013.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The scam was all about the manipulation in the selection\nprocess for government colleges and jobs conducted by the Madhya Pradesh\nprofessional examination board (MPPEB) or Madhya Pradesh Vyavsayik Pariksha\nMandal (Vyapam). It involved the impersonation of candidates, rampant copying,\nblank answer sheets and fake marks.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In an\nunusual action, Kerala Vigilance and Anti-Corruption Bureau chief and DGP Jacob\nThomas, who has taken a tough stand against corrupt politicians including\nex-ministers and bureaucrats, has sought whistleblowers protection for himself .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Interestingly, Thomas was the first IPS\nofficer in the state to get whistleblowers protection from the Union government\nin 2005 after he brought to light corruption in the Kerala State Civil Supplies\nCorporation while serving as its managing director.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whistleblowers \u2013 either\npublic servants, non-profit organisations or individuals \u2013 will not be allowed\nto reveal any documents classified under the Official Secrets Act of 1923, even\nif the purpose is to disclose acts of corruption, misuse of power or criminal\nactivities. This is in addition to any information that could \u201cprejudicially\naffect the interest of the sovereignty and integrity of India, the security of\nthe State, friendly relations with foreign State\u201d \u2013 information that is already\noff-limits in the existing Whistleblowers Protection Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; PARACETAMOL HAS ZERO EFFECT ON INFLAMMATION . . .<br />\n<br />\nPARACETAMOL HAS ZERO ANTI-INFLAMMATORY ACTION TO REDUCE PAIN RELATED TO CHIKUNGUNYA / DENGUE . . .<br />\n<br />\nA LOW DOSE OF BRUFEN DOES NOT CAUSE INTERNAL BLEEDING OR REDUCTION OF BLOOD PLATELET COUNT . . . .<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN, THIS BLOGSITE WAS THE FIRST ON THE PLANET TO SOLVE THE CASE OF STERILISATION DEATHS OF AT CHATTISGARH DUE TO DANGEROUS MEDICINE COMBINATIONS .. . ...<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THAT THE GOVT ACTED INSTANTLY TO BAN UNSAFE DRUG COMBINATIONS .. .<br />\n<br />\nParacetamol does not help reduce inflammation, while aspirin and Ibuprofen does......<br />\n<br />\nBUT ASPIRIN IS A BLOOD THINNER AND CAUSES INTERNAL BLEEDING ....... . .<br />\n<br />\nNormal platelet counts range from 150,000 to 400,000 per microliter in the blood....Thrombocytopenia that requires EMERGENCY treatment is a LOW platelet count below 50,000 per microliter....<br />\n<br />\nThe efficacy of paracetamol by itself in children with fevers has been questioned and a meta-analysis showed that it is less effective than ibuprofen......<br />\n<br />\nParacetamol consists of a benzene ring core. ...Paracetamol is derived from coal tar. ...<br />\n<br />\nIt belongs to the class of drugs known as \"aniline analgesics.\" The gravity of the side effects can be understood by the fact that it is the only such EVIL drug still in use today.....<br />\n<br />\nLAKHS OF INDIANS HAVE DIED DUE TO PARACETAMOL . .<br />\n<br />\nDamage to the liver, or hepatotoxicity, results not from paracetamol itself, but from one of its metabolites, N-acetyl-p-benzoquinoneimine (NAPQI)......NAPQI decreases the liver's natural antioxidant glutathione and directly damages cells in the liver, leading to liver failure.....<br />\n<br />\nSigns of liver injury - include low blood sugar, low blood pH, easy bleeding, and hepatic encephalopathy.......<br />\n<br />\nParacetamol cannot relieve pain even in mild arthritis, and has ZERO effect on the underlying inflammation, redness, and swelling of the joint....<br />\n<br />\nThe symptoms and signs of thrombocytopenia may include-----<br />\n<br />\nSuperficial bleeding into the skin resulting in small reddish spots (petechiae)..<br />\nEasy or excessive bruising (purpura)..<br />\nSpontaneous bleeding from the gums or nose..<br />\nJaundice..<br />\nHeavy menstrual bleeding that's unusual for the individual..<br />\nBlood in the ur1ne or sto0ls..<br />\nEnlarged spleen..<br />\nBleeding that will not stop..<br />\nDVT (deep vein thrombosis)\u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nEVIL PHARMA WANTS INDIANS TO DIE AS A DEPOPULATION AGENDA \u2026. . Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529836889823#c5001973479494635782\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 4:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_38MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1---</span></div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">The&nbsp;</b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: medium;\"><b>constitution</b></span><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;of JOHN DEWEY</b></span><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;( with BR Ambedkar as a front ) was adopted by the Constituent Assembly on 26 November 1949, and came into effect on 26 January 1950..</b></div>\n<br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">The Judiciary interprets the Constitution as its final arbiter.. judiciary cant create laws.. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">United States, became the first society in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing the laws they live under!</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD AUR USKA DEEP STATE AGENTS KEE JAI !</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">MAJJA HAI-- KISSI KOH KUCH NOHIN POTHA !</span><br /><br /><span font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 70, BELOW-</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader has\ninjected Hanuman into Vaastu . &nbsp; Sorry, vaastu\nis several millenniums older than hanuman, a side character in Ramayana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Shastra is a\nscience - it has nothing to do with religion. &nbsp;Read this line twice.&nbsp; It remains the same for a Hindu , Muslim or\nChristian. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Taj Mahal is built to Vaastu. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Kalash, a Vedic form installed on the\nroof of a house, is a signature of Maharishi Vedic architecture. Meaning a\nvessel in Sanskrit, the Kalash enlivens the connection of the house with the\ncosmos.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Taj Mahal was a Hindu structure. &nbsp;&nbsp;Emperor\nShah Jahan is subjected to endless water torture &nbsp;for bad Karma \u2013 his grave ( condensation water\ndrip from top ) &nbsp;is right under the\nbrahmasthan </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objective of Vaastu\nis to become open to positive elemental influences and at the same time become\nprotected from unseen malevolence. &nbsp;Positive\nvibrations can bring happiness through excellence in health and&nbsp; business dealings while the negative\nvibrations can bring grief and losses.&nbsp;\nWho else could figure this all out but the Maharishis who took in Vedic\nverses ( sruti ) from aakasha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit and\nmalayalam the word \u201cvaastu\u201d means a building or structure and so the expression\n\u201cvaastu shastra\u201d is the science of structure. Hindu Architecture addresses two\nkinds of buildings: religious structures\u2013\u2013temples and shrines\u2013\u2013and\nnon-religious structures, civic buildings, business complexes and residential\nhomes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu traditions tell\nus that there are forces, some subtle and others not so subtle, some positive\nand some negative, around us at all times. It has been observed that through\nthe proper orientation of a building and other techniques, the positive forces\ncan be focused in a way that will lead to an increase in wealth, happiness, and\nharmony for the residents of such a building.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversely, the wrong orientation\nof a structure and other architectural failures can cause unhappiness, disease\nand troubles for the inhabitants. The same can be said for other buildings\nincluding temples, business and civic structures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per vaastu shastra\nif any building is constructed as per Vastu Purusha Mandala,&nbsp; then prosperity prevails in the building and\ninhabitants are always happy, healthy, wealthy and satisfied.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vastu Purusha\nMandala is an indispensable part of vastu shastra and constitutes the\nmathematical and diagrammatic basis for generating design. It is the\nmetaphysical plan of a building that incorporates the course of the heavenly\nbodies and supernatural forces.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Purusha refers to energy, power, soul or cosmic\nman.&nbsp;&nbsp; Mandala is the generic name for\nany plan or chart which symbolically represents the cosmos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The normal position of\nthe Vastu Purusha (head in the northeast, legs in the southwest) is as depicted\nin the Paramasaayika Mandala.&nbsp; The\nmandala is put to use in site planning and architecture through a process\ncalled the Pada Vinyasa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Padavinyasa diagram is\ntraced on the building terrain during the padavinyasa ceremony, before starting\nthe construction. Each square of a diagram is assigned to a different deity. In\ncertain texts, the compartments (ko\u1e63\u1e6dha) of the deposit casket are referred to\nby the names of deities associated with the plots of the site diagram.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Kasyapasilpa\nthere are th e letters of the Sanskrit \u2018alphabet\u2019 and the names of the eight\nVidyesvaras assigned to or placed in the casket&nbsp;\nat the beginning of the ceremony, which serve as menas of identifying the\ncompartments later on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mandala\n(architectural plan which represents the cosmos) is put to use in site planning\nand architecture through a process called the Pada Vinyasa.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a method\nwhereby any site can be divided into grids/ modules or pada. Depending on the\nposition of the gods occupying the various modules, the zoning of the site and\ndisposition of functions in a building are arrived at.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Mandala has certain\npoints known as marma which are vital energy spots on which nothing should be\nbuilt. They are determined by certain proportional relationships of the squares\nand the diagonals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A site of any shape can\nbe divided using the Pada Vinyasa. Sites are known by the number of divisions\non each side.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sacred structure such\nas a temple is designed to be not just the home of God, but the actual body of\nGod. The building is sacred because it is the Deity directly. The second\nprinciple concerns the relationship between the macrocosm and the microcosm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\ntiny structure like a temple or a home, compared to the large universe, is\nconstructed as a miniature version, a microcosm, of the greater universe, the\nmacrocosm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And finally, the third principle teaches that the part always\ncontains within itself the whole. Design a building by aligning the universe on\nthe inside with the universe on the outside, knowing that the whole is within,\nand you control the forces of the universe within that building. &nbsp;Sanatana Dharma was the first to understand\nthe holographic nature of the cosmos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu is the basis of\nHindu architecture. There is a lot of flexibility built into this system of\narchitecture. The design of a home is primarily based on the basic needs and\nnecessities of climate, location, orientation, size and most importantly\nyou-The Resident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The VAASTU-Purusha when\npinned down by the gods&nbsp; asked as to what\nshould he do to satisfy his hunger?&nbsp; The\ngods told him to devour the person who does not create a construction favorable\nto him.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep windows open here\nin the morning for the beneficial morning Sun.&nbsp;\nKeep a bowl of water (clean water) and place it at the corner of the\nNorth-East zone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">North-East zone represents the water element in Vastu.&nbsp;&nbsp; Respect this zone as if it\u2019s the heart of\nthe house.&nbsp; This room can be used if you\nare not well and wish to get well fast<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Observe the North-East\ndirection of the house. If there is a huge obstruction, then the house has low\n\u2018Prana\u2019 energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best location for\nkitchen is in the South-East zone which is the fire zone. Cook facing East..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sick building syndrome\nis generally rooted in the presence of Geopathic Stress under the property. There\nwill be a history of the previous occupants suffering from longterm illness,\nfinancial loss or prone to tragedies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pond or a water body\nshould be placed in Northeast corner of the house. My home has a waterfall\nthere for negative ions. Do not have a well in the south -west corner of the\nplot<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">is the worst<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Construct your house in\nsuch way it admits bright morning light into the main doorway<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Do not keep South-West room vacant nor give it\non rent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have a fish\naquarium, have it &nbsp;in north-east\ndirection of your house to reduce negative energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever is displayed\nin your home should be pleasant to the eyes and mind bringing happiness to\nthose who observe them..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your home is where your\nheart is and hence you need to ensure it is rightly filled with the most\nsuitable and essential things which bring in positive and peaceful vibrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having a silver\nswastika on the main door is a good thing ..Make the main door of a home the largest\ndoor. Always have some beautiful design and paint on main door. In other words\navoid keeping main door dull and drab.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do NOT keep pictures of\ndead ancestors in the puja room.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As far as practical\nhave your own source of drinking water. In my home , we do NOT have municipal water.\nWe have a well with crystal clear sparkling living water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid placing the\nkitchen at the North East corner of the house<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The kitchen should not\nbe directly in front of the main door,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid placing the\ndivine idols in the bedroom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While worshipping a\nperson should face East side<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bedroom should be\naesthetically designed with soothing colours and pictures. Have pleasant\npictures associated with happy memories around you. The foot of the bed should\nnot directly face the door of the room.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The overhead tank\nshould be at southwest corner and the sump should always be at northeast\ncorner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep the center of your\nbuilding free of depressions, pillars, columns and water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is recommended that\none performs a Bhumi Pooja (worshipping the earth) before starting the house\nconstruction. This is considered an auspicious beginning and heralds a good\nstart to the proceedings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not build your\nprayer room under the staircase, it is not considered auspicious. The space\nunder the stairs can be used for storage. Picture of deities should be placed\non the east, so wards can pray facing east.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bathroom or toilet door\nshould not face dining hall or kitchen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Shastra says when\nyou build a new house the first thing to do is dig a well. If the water from\nthis well is used for construction, it is considered to be auspicious for the\npeople living in that house.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A well should be round in construction, and should\nbe exposed to sunlight. It is not advisable if a well is shared between two\nproperties. It is advised that the water source or well should be placed on the\nNorth or North-East side of the property.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The plot should not be\ntoo porous. This is so similar to what Muslims say. BUT THIS CONTRADICTS THE INCLUSIVE NATURE OF Sanatana Dharma!<br />\n<br />\nLet me quote -<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.srivaishnavam.com/faq.html#34<br />\n<br />\n34 .Persons like Ramana maharishi, Ramakrishna paramahamsa,and Thiagaraja had the vision of Lord although their sampradayam and preachings are entirely different. How can we say that they did not get salvation at the end of their life, just because they don\u2019t fit into our understanding of the tatvas?<br />\n<br />\nEven an atheist sees the Lord Shreeman Narayana in His Archa Roopam. Seeing His Archa Roopam is same as seeing His para roopam. Does the atheist get moksham? He will not get moksham just because he saw God. He must have an understanding of the tatva-hita-purushaarthas as told in the Veda. At least, he must have understood that only Shreeman Narayana is the unparalleled and unsurpassed supreme self. He must then adopt the sadyopaya (bhatki or prapathi) as per the guidance of a Shree Vaishnava Aachaarya. Only then, he can get moksha. The list of names that you have given in your question is dominated by Advaitins. The Advaitins are prachana-bowdhdas.<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n############<br />\nCapt.
