Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/01/donald-trump-for-president-part-11-capt.html?showComment=1484114350150#c7652073087545217081\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">January 11, 2017 at 11:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_39MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi d,<br />\n<br />\nBhishma had the boon of dying when he wished ( Ichamrithyu ) . He chose a time when he wished to get Moksha.<br />\n<br />\nHe was on a bed of arrows on the Kurusketra battle field till Uttarayana dusk. This is the time chosen for Sabarimala three flashes.<br />\n<br />\nagnir jyotir aha\u1e25 \u015bukla\u1e25 \u1e63a\u1e47-m\u0101s\u0101 uttar\u0101ya\u1e47am<br />\ntatra pray\u0101t\u0101 gacchanti brahma brahma-vido jan\u0101\u1e25 [Bhagawad Gita- 8.24]<br />\nagnih\u0323 \u2014 \ufb01re; jyotih\u0323 \u2014 light; ahah\u0323 \u2014 day; \u015buklah\u0323 \u2014 the white fortnight; s\u0323at\u0323-m\u0101s\u0101h\u0323 \u2014 the six months; uttara-ayanam \u2014 when the sun passes on the northern side; tatra \u2014 there; pray\u0101t\u0101h\u0323 \u2014 those who pass away; gacchanti \u2014 go; brahma \u2014 to the Absolute; brahma-vidah\u0323 \u2014 who know the Absolute; jan\u0101h\u0323 \u2014 persons.<br />\n<br />\nThe Surya Siddhanta defines Uttar\u0101ya\u1e47a as the period between the Makara Sankranti (which currently occurs around January 14) and Karka Sankranti (which currently occurs around July 16)..<br />\n<br />\nMakar Sankranti also known as Makara Sankranti marks the transition of the sun into the zodiacal sign of Makara (Capricorn) on its celestial path, which is the first change in the zodiac after the winter solstice and is the first day of the month of Magha.<br />\n<br />\nMakara Sankranthi is a solar event making it one of the few Hindu festivals which fall on the same date in local calendars every year: 14 January. This date is chosen as the final day of the 41 day VRAT at Sabarimala.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html<br />\n<br />\nThe Maravilakku is a Vedic Havanam or Karpooram homam fire lit on 14th Jan every year since 4000 BC, --unbroken-- by the Malayar followers of Lord Parashurama ( who received it from Indra ) , symbolising the heavenly ascent of Bheeshma pitama.<br />\n<br />\nBefore Parashurama came to Kerala the Malayyars lives in the mountains and the Thirayyar ( or sea navigators ) in the plains.<br />\n<br />\nThe patron saint of the Kerala Thirayyars is Rishi Therayar , the first disciple of Maharishi Agastya .<br />\n<br />\nParashurama too has the boon of iccha mrithyu being a Vishnu avatar . Parashurama will be the MARTIAL GURU of Vishnu's 10th avatar Kalki. The Dharma Shaastha idol at Sabarimala was consecrated by Parashurama.<br />\n<br />\nMakara Jyothi ( 3 flashed ) is the divine Vedic AUPASANA homam fire given by Indra via sage Narada to sage Parashurama. It was into the same continuous fire on the banks of river Saraswati, that beautiful Amba had jumped in self immolation.<br />\n<br />\nParashurama failed to persuade his friend Bheeshma ( a celibate ) to marry Amba. Getting angry the short fused Parashurama attacked the noble Bheeshma, who was equally good in fighting .<br />\n<br />\nAfter fighting for many days Parashurama cooled down and stopped fighting , causing Amba , who was left in the lurch, to jump into the blazing hot camphor AUPASANA fire. This is the light ( Makara Vilakku ) which millions of pilgrims visit Sabari hills to witness on Makara Sanktranti day.<br />\n<br />\nThere is NO restrictions of religion or caste at Sabarimala. However since the deity Ayyappa was a confirmed bachelor, only women after menopause ( or pre-menses girls) can visit the temple. Being celebate was an oath Ayyappa swore to his foster mother ..<br />\n<br />\nAyyappa\u2019s father the King of Panthala Rajashekaran had found him as a handsome baby with a golden chain with a bell on his neck in the forest, while hunting. The queen initially adored him, but, when she got a child of her own later, was very worried that Ayyappa would be the next king.<br />\n<br />\nShe pretended to be sick and told Ayyappa than only the milk of a tiger could cure here. Ayyappa came back riding on a mother tiger, with cubs following. Noble Ayyappa became sad at this obvious conspiracy to kill him , and sacrificed himself to keep his foster mother happy. He disappeared into the forest and swore not to continue his lineage by marrying.<br />\n<br />\nAyyappa surfaced as IMHOTEP later in Egypt.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_39MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_39BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_39B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_40B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9092382837105739764\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_40M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Parashurama installed the deity on Jan 14th sunset.<br />\nSABARIMALA IS THIS PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE \u2013ATTRACTING MORE THAN TWICE THE NUMBER OF PILGRIMS THAN THE MAHA KUMBH FESTIVAL ..<br />\n<br />\nDESH DROHIS WANT TO DISRUPT THIS PILGRIMAGE BY INDUCTING WHORES TO BREAK THE WILL OF PILGRIMS WHO HAVE TAKEN A 41 DAY VRAT OF SEXUAL ABSINENCE .<br />\n<br />\nIn ancient days AUPASANA fires were maintained<br />\n<br />\nThe son lights his aupasana fire during his marriage from his father's aupasana fire.<br />\n<br />\nThe son's fire, like his father's, must be maintained throughout his life.<br />\n<br />\nBHISHMAs AUPASANA FIRE IS WHAT IS SHOWN AS THREE FLASHES AT SABARIMALA<br />\n<br />\nAMBA HAD JUMPED INTO THIS FIRE.<br />\n<br />\nPARSIS CAME WITH THE AUPASANA FIRE OF SHUKRACHARYA TO INDIA<br />\n<br />\nAUPASANA FIRE HOMAM IS DONE BY HUSBAND AND WIFE TOGETHER EVERY SINGLE DAY-- THIS CONTINUING FIRE WITNESSED THEIR MARRIAGE --THEY HAD GONE AROUND IT.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE HUSBAND IS AWAY THE WIFE DOES THIS AUPASANA RITUAL ALONE USING AKSHATA RICE ( HAND POUNDED UNBROKEN GRAIN ) --THE VEDAS REQUIRE IT.<br />\n<br />\nAUPASANA HOMAM IS THE ONLY HINDU RITE A WOMAN CAN DO ON HER OWN--TWICE A DAY.<br />\n<br />\nAUPASANA FIRE KEEPS SOULS PURE. THERE WAS NO WORD CALLED DIVORCE IN THE SANSKRIT DICTIONARY.<br />\n<br />\nTHE GLORY OF SANATANA DHARMA IS BEING SLOWLY EXTINGUISHED -- IN THE NAME OF SUPERSTITION.<br />\n<br />\nTAKING DEADLY CHEMICAL DRUGS FOR MENTAL DEPRESSION AFTER DIVORCE IS CALLED MODERN SCIENCE.<br />\n<br />\nMakara Sankranti has been celebrated in Kerala since the past 6000 years. UGLY foreign controlled bimbettes like Trupti Desai and the Collegium judiciary/ NCW / Benami Media / JNU commies who support her , will never understand this .<br />\n<br />\nNOW THEY WANT TO KICK PONGAL ( JAN 14TH ) AND JALLIKKATTU<br />\n<br />\nI ASK TAMILS \u2013 STOP THIS ATTACK ON SATANATA DHARMA BY EVR PERIYAR FOLLOWERS<br />\n<br />\nPeriyar E.V.Ramasamy, is the mentor of the Dravidian party of Karunanidhi. Jayalalitaa, as soon as she won the elections went of a high profile visit to worship the statue of EVR Periyar<br />\n<br />\nThe owner of British East India company who enslaved India German Jew Rothschild used another German Jew Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche to brainwash EVR Periyar.<br />\n<br />\nEVR Periyar\u2019s constant cry \u201cGod is dead\u201d is actually the cry of Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche.. Periyar Thidal, is the headquarters of Dravidar Kazhagam, an organisation founded by Rothschild stooge Periyar E.V.Ramasamy .<br />\n<br />\nBoth BR Ambedkar and EVR Periyar had written in their books and magazines dozens of times of various occasions that the British rule is better than self rule.<br />\n<br />\nBoth of them did NOT spend a minute fighting for India\u2019s freedom-- everybody knows this . Or so they say.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_40MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_40BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_40B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_41B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6950061941169290587\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_41M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. It is 25 years since that \u2018day of sorrow\u2019 began.<br />\n<br />\nI am not saying this now. I said it the day \u2018indian independence\u2019 was announced. The day the declaration of \u2018independence\u2019 was made public I said very clearly in the editorial in Kudiarasu that \u2018this is a day of sorrow. It is a day of shame for the nation and all of mankind\u2019.\u2014UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild bore the expenses for EVR Periyar to visit all foreign countries like Malaysia, Singapore , Sri Lanka etc with a Tamil diaspora , to brainwash them against Hinduism. In 1949, sixteen years after the death of his first wife, Periyar married his 28 years old secretary, Annaiyar Maniyammai. Periyar was 70 years old at that time.<br />\n<br />\nHis marriage led to a split in Dravidar Kazhagam (DK) and some of Periyar\u2019s followers led by C.N. Annadurai (1909-1969) formed a separate organization called Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK). In 1953 in order to discourage idol-worship, Periyar led a statewide campaign to break the idols of Ganesh at public places .<br />\n<br />\nEV Ramasamy Periyar was buried and NOT cremated at Periyar Thidal on 25 December in a wooden coffin , with plenty of Christians in attendance .<br />\n<br />\nMGR and Jaya were buried too, against their personal wishes.<br />\n<br />\nEVR Periyar got a Rothschild sponsored citation awarded by the UNESCO described Periyar as \"the prophet of the new age, the Socrates of South East Asia, father of social reform movement and arch enemy of ignorance, superstitions, meaningless customs and base manners.<br />\n<br />\nThis was as a reward for using violent and vulgar language in his writings against Hindu gods, the Vedas and past Indian culture and advising Hindus to convert to Christianity.<br />\n<br />\nAfter Periyar died in 1974, his wife Maniyammai, the new head of the Dravidar Kazhagam, set fire to the effigies of 'Rama', 'Sita' and 'Lakshmana' at Periyar Thidal, Madras. If you throw shit on Hindusim, you get foreign funds.<br />\n<br />\nEVR\u2019s made a huge faux paus once \u2013 he said \u201c Tamil is a language of barbarians \u201c. text-decoration: none;\">January 16, 2017 at 9:46 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHERE ARE ONLY 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS , CREATED BY ADI SHANKARACHARYA 4000 YEARS AGO<br />\n<br />\nBefore Adi Shankaracharya ( kerala namboodiri) died, he established four Mutts to propagate Vedanta and the Advaita form of Hindusim at Sringeri, Dwarka, Puri and Badrinath.<br />\n<br />\nEach mutt was assigned one Veda.<br />\n<br />\nThe mutts are\u2014<br />\n<br />\nJyothir Mutt ( Badrikashrama ) at Badrinath in northern India Himalayas with Atharva Veda under Sri Totakacharya ;<br />\n<br />\nSarada Mutt at Sringeri in southern India with Yajur Veda under Sri Sureshwaracharya ;<br />\n<br />\nGovardhan Mutt at Jaganath Puri in eastern India with Rig Veda under Sri Hastamalakacharya<br />\n<br />\nand<br />\n<br />\nKalika Mutt at Dwarka in western India with Sama Veda, under Sri Padmapadacharya .<br />\n<br />\nONLY KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE ALLOWED TO BE ACHARYAS OF THESE 4 MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nREST ALL MUTTS ALL OVER INDIA , ARE FAKE CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">\u201c SHABDA BRAHMAN ( LONGITUDINAL SOUND WAVES ) CAN PUT OF GIANT FOREST FIRES AND BUST TEMPERATURE INVERSION LAYER WHICH CAUSE SMOG OVER ENTIRE CITIES \u201c</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">###################</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">PEOPLE WHO RIDICULE SANATANA DHARMA , DO NOT KNOW THAT THERE IS ZERO SUPERSTITION .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">HINDUISM IS NOT BULLSHIT THEOLOGY OF SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">IN AGNIHOTRA WE USED AN INVERTED COPPER PYRAMID HOMAM KUND &nbsp;FOR THE FIRE.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">IT HAS THE SRI YANTRA ANGLE OF 51 DEGREES 49 MINUTES 38.25 SECONDS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">MY REVELATIONS HAVE NOW JUMPED TO 28.0 %</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">NO MORE JUMPING THE GUN OK ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">EJACULATION MUST COME AFTER HUMPING\u2014NOT BEFORE</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">PATIENCE MUST BE THE WATCHWORD</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">At night you can hear people on the other side of a huge lake\u2014at daytime you cant hear them. Why ? It is due to the refraction of sound waves. The speed of a wave depends on the elastic and inertia properties of the medium through which it travels. When a wave encounters different medium where the wave speed is different, the wave will change directions. Often the change in the wave speed, and the resulting refraction, is due to a change in the local temperature of the air. For example, during the day the air is warmest right next to the ground and grows cooler above the ground. This is called a temperature lapse. Since the temperature decreases with height, the speed of sound also decreases with height. This means that for a sound wave traveling close to the ground, the part of the wave closest to the ground is traveling the fastest, and the part of the wave farthest above the ground is traveling the slowest. As a result, the wave changes direction and bends upwards. This can create a \"shadow zone\" region into which the sound wave cannot penetrate. A person standing in the shadow zone will not hear the sound even though he might be able to see the source. The sound waves are being refracted upwards and will never reach the observer. A temperature inversion is when the temperature is coolest right next to the ground and warmer as you increase in height above the ground. Since the temperature increases with height, the speed of sound also increases with height. This means that for a sound wave traveling close to the ground, the part of the wave closest to the ground is traveling the slowest, and the part of the wave farthest above the ground is traveling the fastest. As a result, the wave changes direction and bends downwards. Temperature inversions most often happen at night after the sun goes down when the ground (or water in a lake) cools off quickly, while the air above the ground remains warm. This downward refraction of sound is why you can hear the conversations of campers across the lake, when otherwise you should not be able to hear them</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">..</span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6132436477067393252\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_108M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html?showComment=1487255493184#c6132436477067393252\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 16, 2017 at 8:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_108MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS BRAHMA NOT WORSHIPED IN INDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMA WAS INDEED WORSHIPED IN INDIA --WE HAD ANCIENT BRAHMA TEMPLES WITH HUGE BRAHMA IDOLS WITH A COLOUR CHANGING HUGE DIAMOND AS \"BRAHMAs THIRD EYE \"<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HUGE DIAMOND WOULD SPARKLE CYAN BLUE IN SUNLIGHT AND IN DARKNESS BRILLIANT RED<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS A CURSE TO STEAL THIS DIAMOND--WHOEVER STOLE IT DIED PAINFUL DEATHS<br />\n<br />\nTHAT IS WHY AFTER STEALING THESE DIAMONDS WERE CUT INTO THREE AND REPOLISHED BY A DIFFERENT CUT<br />\n<br />\nTHE BLACK ORLOV DIAMOND WAS STOLEN BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE JEW CONVERTED TO HINDUISM GOT ENTRY INTO THE PONDICHERRY TEMPLE AS A PRIEST ( HE KNEW SANSKRIT MANTRAS )<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/total-internal-reflection-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nAT KERALA PADMANABHASWAMY TEMPLE ( WHERE WE UNEARTHED TREASURE WORTH BILLIONS OF US DOLLAR ) , A RECLINING VISHNU LAY UNMOLESTED FOR CENTURIES TILL SOME SMART ASS PRIEST USED A POWERFUL DEGREASER AMWAY CLEANER - WHAT WAS OILY BLACK SUDDENLY BECAME GOLD.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.forbes.com/sites/jimdobson/2015/11/13/a-one-trillion-dollar-hidden-treasure-chamber-is-discovered-at-indias-sree-padmanabhaswam-temple/#3b9314ae21eb<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL BRAHMA THIRD EYES OF COLOUR CHANGING STONES WERE INSET INSIDE BRAHMAS HEAD AS THE PINEAL GLAND BY A SPECIAL DRILLING PROCESS<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE BRAHMA STATUE HEADS WERE HAMMERED DOWN BY THE ISLAMIC INVADERS<br />\n<br />\nHINDU TEMPLE IDOLS WERE CONSECRATED --THERE IS A TECHNICAL CALCULATION DONE BY CALCULUS A RELATION BETWEEN THE FLAGSTAFF VAHANA, THE THIRD EYE OF THE IDOL AND THE DISTANCE WHERE THE DEVOTEE STANDS WHILE PRAYING--ONLY ONE MAN CAN PRAY AT THIS SPOT.<br />\n<br />\nIN GURUVAYUR TEMPLE FOR EXAMPLE--YOU CAN PRAY ONLY FOR TWO SECONDS WITH EYES WIDE OPEN -- AFTER THAT YOU WILL BE CAST ASIDE<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE EXPLAINED THE SCIENCE BEHIND THE DIPOLE ANTENNA IN THE POST BELOW. TODAY THE WHITEMAN HAS PATENTED ALL THIS IN HIS NAME.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY ALL BRAHMA PINEAL GLAND DIAMONDS --WHICH THE ISLAMIC INVADER COULD NOT STEAL<br />\n<br />\nAND HE COOLED UP FOUL LIES WHY HINDUS DONT WORSHIP BRAHMA<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nTHE QUTAB MINAR IS AN EXAMPLEOF BRAHMA WORSHIP-- A HUGE BRAHMA STATUE WITH SUCH A THIRD EYE STONE EXISTED RIGHT ON TOP OF \"DHRUV STAMBH \"-- THE PAVILION INSIDE WHICH THIS IDOL EXISTED IS DISCARDED AND LIES NEARBY<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS THE COCK AND BULL STORY WRITTEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS-<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE\" According to Hindu puranas once Brahma and Vishnu were overcome with the sense of self-importance. They began to argue as to who was the greater of the two. As the argument became heated, Lord Shiva had to intervene.<br />\n<br />\nShiva took the form of a gigantic linga (the phallic symbol of Shiva). The lingam was made of fire and it extended from the heaven to the underworld. The lingam told both Brahma and Vishnu that if any of them could find the end of the lingam, He will be declared as the greater of the two. Both Brahma and Vishnu agreed to the deal and set out in opposite directions of the lingam to find its end. But as they kept searching for years, they realized that the lingam had no end.<br />\n<br />\nVishnu realized the fact that Shiva was the greatest among the Trinity ( DIVIDE AND RULE ) . But Brahma decided to trick Shiva. While he was on the search of the end, he passed the flower of Ketaki at the uppermost part of the lingam.<br />\n<br />\nHe requested the Ketaki flower to testify before Shiva that Brahma had reached the uppermost part of the lingam and had seen the end. The Ketaki flower agreed. When brought before Shiva, the flower falsely testified that Brahma had seen the end.<br />\n<br />\nLord Shiva became furious at this lie. He then cursed Brahma that He would never be worshipped by any human being. He also cursed the Ketaki flower that it would not be used in any Hindu ritual. Hence, Brahma was cursed not to be worshipped by anyone.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_108BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html?showComment=1487255535815#c2903253369664349482\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 16, 2017 at 8:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_107MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nPOISON INJECTION NO 2 : Curse Of Saraswati .. According to another legend in the puranas , after Brahma took birth, he soon created Goddess Saraswati. As soon as He created Her, He became overpowered by LUST due to her ethereal beauty.<br />\n<br />\nBut Saraswati did not want to be associated with carnal desire of INCEST and she changed her forms to escape from Brahma's sexual overtures. But He did not give up. Finally, unable to control Her anger, the Goddess cursed Brahma that He would not be worshipped by any being on Earth.<br />\n<br />\nHence, PEDOPHILE Brahma is not worshipped in Hinduism in spite of being the Creator. Brahma's lust signifies the fall of humanity. In Hinduism, it is believed that the basic desires hinders the path to salvation. But the Creator fell prey to the basic desires and so the downfall of humanity was inevitable. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nTHESE BASTARDS DO NOT KNOW THAT ALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ON MACRO AND MICRO SCALE --EXCEPT VISHNUs HUMAN AVATARS VAMANA, PARASHURAMA, RAM, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/my-visit-to-bhagyalaxmi-nagar-or-modern.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_108b+seedCApGD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_108b+seedCApGD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\nsushant jain<br />\nFebruary 18, 2017 at 11:36 AM<br />\n<br />\nFantastic!<br />\nWe have a statue carved out of a single rock in Mangi tungi (Nashik ) of Lord Rishabhnath.<br />\nit has got 2 guiness awards (like we care) both for interesting reasons.1st it is 108ft (OM) tall.<br />\n2nd even more interesting its energy level is 107000 Bovis (highest energy level) in the world. font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_14M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1480406620374#c1188457139892902385\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 29, 2016 at 1:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_14MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/home/environment/flora-fauna/Scientists-record-biggest-ever-coral-die-off-on-Australias-Great-Barrier-Reef/articleshow/55678569.cms<br />\n<br />\n############ SUBJECT --- BIGGEST CORAL REEF DIE OFF AUSTRALIAN GREAT BARRIER REEF ################<br />\n<br />\nLYING BASTARDS ........ CARBON DI OXIDE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THIS.......<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">IN 1998 THE CORAL IN GREAT BARRIER REEF WAS BLEACHED \u2026<br /><br />THIS YEAR 2016 IT IS BLEACHED AGAIN\u2026.<br /><br />WHY, YOU LYING CUNTS ?....</span></b><br />\n<br />\nExperiment :\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTake two identical plain sodas. Basically water aerated with Carbon Dioxide\u2026<br />\nOpen both bottles at the same time \u2026.<br />\nKeep one bottle in ice water and the other in hotwater\u2026<br />\nAfter 5 minutes take a sip\u2026<br />\nThe cold soda will have CO2 gas\u2026<br />\nThe warm soda will be flat like water\u2026.<br />\nWhy?...<br />\nCold water retains CO2 gas . \u2026<br />\nWarm water releases CO2 gas\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThis is why in hot years El Nino years , oceans release Carbon Dioxide\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBefore the west started FRACKING and leaking Methane there was NO El Nino\u2014it was unheard of\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWarmer water temperatures can result in coral bleaching\u2026 When water is too warm, corals will expel the algae (zooxanthellae) living in their tissues causing the coral to turn completely white. ..When a coral bleaches, it is not dead\u2026 Corals can survive a bleaching event\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCoral bleaching occurs when the relationship between the coral host and zooxanthellae, which give coral much of their colour, breaks down\u2026 Without the zooxanthellae, the tissue of the coral animal appears transparent and the coral's bright white skeleton is revealed\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A UNIQUE PARTNERSHIP \u2013 ONE GIVES FOOD, THE OTHER GIVES SHELTER..<br />\n<br />\nLike a ped0phile telling a small girl--You give me your mango, I give you my banana type\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn exchange for the coral providing them with a protected place to live and some compounds they need for photosynthesis ( carbon dioxide) the algae in turn give the coral oxygen, glucose and other photosynthates it uses for respiration and other metabolic functions. ..Zooxanthellae can deliver up to 100% of the daily required energy budget for corals\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe main cause of coral bleaching is heat stress resulting from high sea temperatures and in Australia is has been seen during El Nino years . ..<br />\n<br />\nIn El Nino year 1998, there was a global mass bleaching event where 56% t of the reefs on the Great Barrier Reef suffered bleaching\u2026<br />\nIf the water in the reef gets too warm, the coral will expel the algae from their tissue, leaving the coral with a ghastly \"bleached\" appearance\u2026. At that point, the coral lose a key source of food and become more susceptible to deadly diseases\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nOften many coral will then die off, which in turn can adversely affect the fish that rely on the reefs\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_14BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1480406644480#c1322778463898849390\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 29, 2016 at 1:34 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_13MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nRight now as I type, Australia is suffering the WORST EVER mass bleaching events since man came on planet earth\u2026<br />\n<br />\nZooxanthellae, which live inside the coral and produce food using the sun's energy.. The symbiotic relation is based on the corals inability to generate sufficient amounts of food and the Zoozanthellae algae\u2019s ability for photosynthesis and converting chemical elements into energy\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe coral in return provides protection as well as a nutrient rich environment for excellent algae growth\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCorals are completely dependent on the symbiotic algae. ..They would not be able to survive without them since they can\u2019t produce sufficient amounts of food... The zooxanthellae can provide all the nutrients necessary, in most cases all the carbon needed for the coral to build the calcium carbonate skeleton\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSince light is essential for photosynthesis hard corals are not found below 75 meters. ..<br />\n<br />\nCorals can adjust the algae population on a daily basis by releasing or by taking up algae as needed\u2026<br />\nIn cases of excessive algae growth or temporary nutrient shortage, the coral can directly feed off the excess algae\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCorals also eat by catching tiny floating animals called zooplankton. \u2026At night, coral polyps come out of their skeletons to feed, stretching their long, stinging tentacles to capture critters that are floating by. Prey are pulled into the polyps\u2019 mouths and digested in their stomachs\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAgain, zooxanthellae, the symbiotic algae that LIVE within their tissues and give the coral its color. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe coral PROVIDE FOOD ( CO2 ) that the algae need for photosynthesis. In turn, the algae nourish the coral with oxygen and the organic products of photosynthesis. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe coral uses these compounds to synthesize calcium carbonate (limestone) with which it constructs its skeleton\u2014the coral reef\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSO YOU CUNTS , CAN STOP GIVING BULL ABOUT OCEAN ACIDIFICATION DUE TO INDIA RELEASING CO2 FROM OUR COAL POWER PLANETS AND BY CREMATING OUR DEAD \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />HEY KOSHER WEATHER CUNTS\u2026<br /><br />WHY IS ANTARCTIC ICE AT A RECORD HIGH , WHEN CO2 LEVEL IS AT HIGHEST AT ANTARCTIC ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBATAOA NAH ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_14b+seedCz0cD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_14b+seedCz0cD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c197492560231474893\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_15M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. You'd rather hide your money in an offshore bank account than store large numbers of banknotes.<br />\n<br />\nCash has repeatedly demonstrated its importance in times of crisis. When natural disasters knock out an electrical grid for days or even weeks, cash is a saving grace for residents to obtain critical supplies.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS TOTALLY UNPREPARED FOR A EMP ATTACK --PAKISTAN IS BETTER EQUIPPED<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I DOUBT IF MODI EVEN HEARD THE TERM EMP--THOUGH MY POSTS HAVE BEEN SENT TO PMO DOZENS OF TIMES</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHESE SLAVES IN PMO--DO NOT WANT TO GIVE MODI ANY INFO WHICH WILL HURTS HIS GIANT GUJARATI EGO<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL PARTS OF THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-and-emp-taken-out.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDuring the global financial crisis following the collapse of Lehman Brothers in 2008, cash became a safe haven for consumers looking to keep their assets intact<br />\n<br />\nTHE BABY MUST CRAWL BEFORE IT CAN FLY<br />\n<br />\nMODI WANTS TO FLY - Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nNovember 30, 2016 at 7:39 PM<br />\n<br />\nhi bz,<br />\n<br />\nwhen the CRYING BOLLYWOOD SUPERSTAR put a defamation case against me--the police ( well wishers really ) asked me--<br />\n<br />\n\" captain, we know you are a desh bhakt and an intellectual --but we dont understand why you sent your eldest son to usa \"<br />\n<br />\nall i replied was \" he will come back\"<br />\n<br />\nit was not worth explaining<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WAS AT SCHOOL , I USED TO BE MAHAAA IMPRESSED WITH NAMES LIKE JOHN, MARY, DICK AND PRICK .<br />\n<br />\nI DID MY LKG / UKG / AND FIRST AND THIRD STANDARD WITH ANGLO INDIAN GIRLS .<br />\n<br />\ni did NOT do second standard as teachers felt, i was too troublesome in class -- coming first rank too<br />\n<br />\nLATER I STARTED SAILING AND GOT MY EXPERIENCE WITH WHITE SKINNED PEOPLE ALL OVER THE WORLD<br />\n<br />\nI KNEW WITHIN MYSELF THAT I WAS 100 TIMES SMARTER THAN THESE PEOPLE WHOM I ONCE IDOLIZED ( IN MORAL SCIENCE CATHOLIC CLASSES IT WAS ALL ABOUT THE WHITE MAN SAVING THE DIRTY HEATHEN INDIAN )<br />\n<br />\nMY JOB MADE ME WALK THE PATH OF EXPERIENCE --<br />\n<br />\nwhen my elder on was leaving calicut for cornell , at the airport i told him--<br />\n<br />\n\" FIND OUT WHAT YOU ARE WORTH. YOU WILL BE PITTING YOURSELF AGAINST THE BEST BRAINS ON THE PLANET IN YOUR COMPUTER SCIENCE MASTERS CLASS \"<br />\n<br />\nit did NOT take long for him , to realise his own worth<br />\n<br />\nTHINKING IS THE MOST DIFFICULT THING ON THE PLANET-- FOR AN AVERAGE INDIAN THINKING IS LIKE BREATHING--SO NATURAL -- SO EASY<br />\n<br />\nwhen my son passed out , he applied for a job in the best companies of USA<br />\n<br />\nthe first test is usually CODING ( on line exam ) -- usually runs 3 hours<br />\n<br />\nall the companies replied within the hour \" YOUR CODING ABILITIES ARE OUTSTANDING-- WE SHALL NOW SKIP ALL INTERMEDIATE EXAMS AND GO FOR THE FINAL EXAM\"<br />\n<br />\nthousands of people have taken this coding test -- clarity of thought shines through , when you reduce complex stuff ( honored by time ) into ridiculously simple stuff<br />\n<br />\nthis is when self realisation hits you like an avalanche .<br />\n<br />\nyou have competed in OPEN maidan against the best and you have won. the moment you find yourself on a BAD WICKET you know someone has cheated .<br />\n<br />\nwinning in an OPEN FIELD , this is NOT like a JEW like albert einstein ( clerk in patents office) cheating and getting a nobel prize --<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">-or jewess hillary clinton beating trump in the presidential debate ( getting questions/ answers ) before hand.<br /><br />did i not predict this, way before wikileaks --just by watching her body language ? it is on record</span><br />\n<br />\nEVERY HUMAN MUST WALK ON THE PATH OF SELF DISCOVERY -FOR LIBERATION .<br />\n<br />\nONCE YOU START ON THAT UNKNOWN PATH OF THORNS, THERE IS NO TURNING BACK-- THE COSMOS WONT ALLOW YOU.<br />\n<br />\nFOR THIS IS THE PATH OF HUMAN SPIRIT.<br />\n<br />\nYOU HAVE DARED TO WALK SO FAR, WITH A FRESH PAIR OF EYES --WHY TURN BACK NOW ?<br />\n<br />\nANIMALS IN A ZOO WONT UNDERSTAND THIS<br />\n<br />\nYOU ARE MORE POWERFUL THAN YOU KNOW . .<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU DONT DARE TO WALK THIS PATH, YOU DIE IN DUE COURSE OF OLD AGE , WITHOUT MAKING A DENT IN THE UNIVERSE.<br />\n<br />\nMENTORS CAUSE A MENTEE TO TAKE HIS OWN DECISION AND WALK ON THIS PATH OF SELF DISCOVERY<br />\n<br />\nIN MY LIFE, I HAVE ALWAYS STRUCK MY OWN PATH AND CARRIED MY OWN TORCH.<br />\n<br />\njust because my path is different from the beaten track--it does not mean that i am lost.<br />\n<br />\nLIFE ON EARTH IS A SCHOOL -- YOUR SOUL ALREADY KNOWS<br />\n<br />\nWITHOUT ADVENTURE , HOW WILL YOU KNOW WHERE YOU BELONG ? Roosevelt closed the banks, then announced it was illegal to own gold.<br />\n<br />\nJew FDR forced the American people to give back private gold to the Fed \u2013all of which went to Jew Rothschild\u2019s private vaults. In 1933 Roosevelt made the dollar fiat currency domestically, but backed by gold internationally.<br />\n<br />\nA Presidential Executive Order by Roosevelt on April 5, 1933, required all the people to exchange their gold coins, gold bullion, and gold-backed currency for money that was not redeemable in precious metals. The Gold Reserve Act of 1934, known as the Thomas Amendment which amended the Act of May 12, 1933, made it illegal to possess any gold currency (which was [finally] rescinded December 31, 1974).<br />\n<br />\nGold coinage was withdrawn from circulation and kept in the form of bullion. Just as the public was to return all their gold to the U.S. Government, so was the Federal Reserve. However, while the people received $20.67 per ounce in paper money issued by the Federal Reserve, the Reserve was paid in Gold Certificates. Now the Jew Rothschild / Federal Reserve had total control of all the gold in the country.<br />\n<br />\nThe United States Gold Reserve Act of January 30, 1934 required that all gold and gold certificates held by the Federal Reserve be surrendered and vested in the sole title of the United States Department of the Treasury.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gold Reserve Act outlawed most private possession of gold, forcing individuals to sell it to the Treasury, after which it was stored in United States Bullion Depository at Fort Knox and other locations<br />\n<br />\nA year earlier, in 1933, Executive Order 6102 had made it a criminal offense for U.S. citizens to own or trade gold anywhere in the world, with exceptions for some jewelry and collector's coins.<br />\n<br />\nThese prohibitions were relaxed starting in 1964 \u2013 gold certificates were again allowed for private investors on April 24, 1964, although the obligation to pay the certificate holder on demand in gold specie would not be honored. By 1975 Americans could again freely own and trade gold.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1971 President Richard M. Nixon repeals the 1934 Gold Reserve Act so citizens can own gold. This was all accomplished by design.<br />\n<br />\nUnder orders of the creditor the Federal Reserve System and its private owners on April 5, 1933 President Franklin D. Roosevelt issued Presidential order 6102, which required all Americans to deliver all gold coins, gold bullion, and gold certificates to their local Federal Reserve Bank on or before April 28, 1933.<br />\n<br />\nAny violators would be fined up to $10,000, imprisoned up to ten years, or both for knowingly violating this order.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThe way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets.\u201d -- John D. text-decoration: none;\">December 6, 2016 at 3:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_95MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nwhat are the problems faced by ceserian kids ?<br />\n<br />\nwhat is Familial Dysautonomia ?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_95BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_93T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_93TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_93TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_93TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_93TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_93TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_93TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_93TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_93TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_93B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4000980468419115865\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_93M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/extracorporeal-membrane-oxygenation.html?showComment=1481035812101#c4000980468419115865\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 6, 2016 at 8:20 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_93MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nREADY TO BE SURPRISED ?<br />\n<br />\nFD is a disorder of the autonomic nervous system which affects the development and survival of sensory, sympathetic and some parasympathetic neurons in the autonomic and sensory nervous system resulting in variable symptoms including: insensitivity to pain, inability to produce tears, poor growth, and labile blood pressure (episodic hypertension and postural hypotension). It is caused by mutations in the IKBKAP gene.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE MIDDLE AGES, HOMOSEXUALS IN EASTERN EUROPE GROUPED TOGETHER UNDER A STRONG KING IN THE KHAZAR REGION.<br />\n<br />\nONE FINE DAY THIS KING CONVERTED TO JUDAISM AND ISSUED A FIAT THAT ALL UNDER HIS KINGSHIP MUST ALSO DO SO.<br />\n<br />\nTHUS STARTED THE ASHKENAZI JEWS --WHO NOW CLAIM ISRAEL IN A FALSE MANNER.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE AFFLICTED BY A SHAMEFUL GENETIC DISEASE ( BY PAT CANNIBALISM ) CALLED FAMILIAL DYSAUTONOMIA OR RILEY-DAY SYNDROME.<br />\n<br />\nA LOT OF THE AFFECTED JEWISH PEOPLE WERE ANAL SEX RECEIVING MALES-- AS THEY GOT NO PENILE ERECTION<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER ELIMINATED THEM -- BY A ENSNARE AND KILL PROGRAM USING GAY BEER BARS--<br />\n<br />\nTHESE MALES WITH ERECTILE DYSFUNCTION ( CANNOT REPRODUCE ) WERE NOT SUITABLE FOR THE PROMISED LAND OF ISRAEL. THEY COULD ONLY RECEIVE SEMEN IN THEIR ASSHOLES AND MOUTH<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html<br />\n<br />\nBUT EVEN TODAY ONE IN TWENTY TWO ASHKENAZI JEWS IS A CARRIER OF FAMILIAL DYSAUTONOMIA ( FD ). THIS IS AN EXCLUSIVE EUROPEAN JEW DISEASE --DUE TO PAST CANNIBALISM.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS THE LEAST HOMOSEXUALITY ON THIS PLANET DUE TO OUR GOTRA SYSTEM. WHATEVER LITTLE WE HAVE IN INDIA IS DUE TO FOREIGN DNA ( INTERBREEDING ) DURING 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/gotra-system-khap-rules-y-chromosome.html<br />\n<br />\nThe disease is caused by a change (mutation) of the IKBKAP gene on chromosome 9.<br />\n<br />\nFD is passed down through families (inherited). A person must inherit a copy of the defective gene from each parent to develop the condition.<br />\n<br />\nIt is caused by a change (mutation) to a gene due to cannibalism practised by ancestors.<br />\n<br />\nSymptoms of Riley-Day syndrome include:----<br />\n<br />\nBreath-holding spells (can lose consciousness)<br />\nConstipation<br />\nDecrease in sense of taste<br />\nDiarrhea<br />\nDry eyes<br />\nFeeding problems<br />\nInability to feel pain and changes in temperature (can lead to injuries)<br />\nLack of tears when crying<br />\nLong periods of vomiting<br />\nPoor coordination and unsteady walk<br />\nPoor growth<br />\nRepeated fevers<br />\nRepeated pneumonia<br />\nSeizures<br />\nSkin blotching<br />\nSweating while eating<br />\nUnusually smooth, pale tongue surface<br />\nSymptoms are present at birth and grow worse over time.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_93MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_93BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_93B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_94B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9191507297878354621\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_94M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/extracorporeal-membrane-oxygenation.html?showComment=1481035836369#c9191507297878354621\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 6, 2016 at 8:20 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_94MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThe following complications are possible:----<br />\n<br />\nBlotching of the face and torso<br />\nExcessive sweating of the head and torso<br />\nHigh blood pressure and rapid heart rate<br />\nInsomnia<br />\nIrritability<br />\nPatchy skin tone on the hands and feet<br />\nNausea and vomiting<br />\nSevere problems swallowing, drooling<br />\nWorsening of muscle tone<br />\n<br />\nFamilial dysautonomia is a genetic disorder that affects the development and survival of certain nerve cells. The disorder disturbs cells in the autonomic nervous system, which controls involuntary actions such as digestion, breathing, production of tears, and the regulation of blood pressure and body temperature.<br />\n<br />\nIt also affects the sensory nervous system, which controls activities related to the senses, such as taste and the perception of pain, heat, and cold.<br />\n<br />\nProblems related to this disorder first appear during infancy. Early signs and symptoms include poor muscle tone (hypotonia), feeding difficulties, poor growth, lack of tears, frequent lung infections, and difficulty maintaining body temperature.<br />\n<br />\nOlder infants and young children with familial dysautonomia may hold their breath for prolonged periods of time, which may cause a bluish appearance of the skin or lips (cyanosis) or fainting. This breath-holding behavior usually stops by age 6. Developmental milestones, such as walking and speech, are usually delayed,<br />\nAdditional signs and symptoms in school-age children include bed wetting, episodes of vomiting, reduced sensitivity to temperature changes and pain, poor balance, abnormal curvature of the spine (scoliosis), poor bone quality and increased risk of bone fractures, and kidney and heart problems.<br />\n<br />\nAffected individuals also have poor regulation of blood pressure. They may experience a sharp drop in blood pressure upon standing (orthostatic hypotension), which can cause dizziness, blurred vision, or fainting. They can also have episodes of high blood pressure when nervous or excited, or during vomiting incidents.<br />\n<br />\nAbout one-third of children with familial dysautonomia have learning disabilities, such as a short attention span, that require special education classes. By adulthood, affected individuals often have increasing difficulties with balance and walking unaided. Other problems that may appear in adolescence or early adulthood include lung damage due to repeated infections, impaired kidney function, and worsening vision due to the shrinking size (atrophy) of optic nerves, which carry information from the eyes to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nAAJ KELIYE INTHA KAAFI !<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 22.85%<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedGIZKD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7503721076071245253\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_110M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Not because they got screwed by Stinger Missiles.<br />\n<br />\nNo Russian helicopter or MIG jet was ever made without INFRA RED COUNTERMEASURES .An infrared countermeasure (IRCM) is a device designed to protect aircraft from infrared homing (\"heat seeking\") missiles by confusing the missiles' infrared guidance system so that they will miss their target (Electronic countermeasure).Flares create infrared targets with a much stronger signature than the aircraft's engines. The flares provide false targets that cause the missile to make incorrect steering decisions. The missile will rapidly break off a target lock-on.<br />\n<br />\nSO --<br />\n<br />\nFUCK YOU CHARLIE WILSON !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8005234381321692977\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_161M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient times, even\nthe most violent animals used to give up their vicious nature in the ambience\nof a rishi\u2019s hermitage. &nbsp;&nbsp;This is a dynamic example of vaastu.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone asked me \u2013so is\nVaastu all about sunlight and cross ventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, it is a minor\nfactor,-- that is all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu is NOT Chinese\nFeng Shui, where you can eekp come crystals or frogs or smiling Buddha and ward\nawat negative energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VAASTU HAS BEEN\nVERIFIED BY SUPERMEN MAHARISHIS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA IS ALL\nABOUT VIBRATIONS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viibration exists in\nour buildings, our home and workplace, just as it exists within us. &nbsp;Vaastu aims to maintain and even enhance the\npositive vibrations and block out the negative ones, thus making the building\u2019s\nvibration resonate and harmonise with the surrounding environment and the\nvibration of its inhabitants.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Vaastu building channelises the positive cosmic\nenergies to flow into it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a misconception\nthat Vaastu is the science of designing structures in accordance with local\nenvironment like prevailing wind conditions and other weather patterns to\nachieve ideal lighting and temperature within the building. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu is a result of understanding the role\nof the five basic elements in nature, namely earth, water, fire, air and space\nin generating and regulating cosmic energies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also explains how a harmonious\nco-existence of all these elements in a building promotes not only our\nphysical, mental and spiritual well-being but also helps us actualise our true\npotential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This principle of\nabsolute harmony and consonance in the universe is the governing principle of\nthe science of Vaastu.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Disturb this\nharmony and chaos will result.. Violate the law of nature in your home or place\nof work, and you end up with disharmony.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vaastu Purusha is\nthe presiding deity of any site. Usually he is depicted as lying on it with the\nhead in the northeast and legs in the southwest but he keeps changing position\nthroughout the year. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha refers to\nenergy, power, soul or cosmic man.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mandala is the generic name for any plan or\nchart which symbolically represents the cosmos.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Energy is primarily\nconsidered as emanating from the center of the building.&nbsp;&nbsp; Many people believe that it comes from the\nNorth East corner but in fact it comes from the Brahmasthan or center of the\nbuilding.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Kerala\ntharavadu bunglows had the centre courtyard with a tulsi tara at the brahmastan\n.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: Vaastu rectangles are 1: 1.618</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Indian architecture,\nthe dwelling is itself a shrine.&nbsp;&nbsp; A home\nis called Manushyalaya, literally, \"Human Temple\".&nbsp;&nbsp; It is not merely a shelter for human beings\nin which to rest and eat.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All around the world,\nhouse building is regarded as a mundane job.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The basic principle of\nVAASTU is to adopt the macro and micro effects of nature and train them in\nfavour of human being.
