font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only 8 % of your energy\nresources actually come from the food you consume. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The remaining 92% of\nyour energy needs are found in the Air you breath, the Water you drink, the\nLight you absorb, the Earth you live on, and the Universe you inhabit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try reducing the oxygen\ncontent of the air you breathe, or quality of the water you drink, or deprive yourself\nof sunlight \u2013you will know what I mean<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Earth\u2018s magnetic\nfield is not a blanket, but a maze of grids which are complex, but which have\ndefinite pat\u00adterns. &nbsp;&nbsp;BEM grids are of\nfour types - Major, Principal, Normal and Subsidiary.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the first three\nemanate grid lines perpendicular to the earth\u2018s surface, the Subsidiary lines\nare at varying angles, whose dimensions vary ac\u00adcording to the geography of\nlocations.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Major and Principal\nGrids can sometimes be kilometers apart, while the Normal Grids are found to be\nseparated by smaller distances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the Major Grid\nLines have a width of 50m to 60m, the Principal Grid Lines have a width of 40m\nto 50m, and the Normal Lines have a width of 6m to 8m. The Major and Principal\nGrid Lines contain sub-lines of radiation within them, which again emanate\nperpendicular to the earth\u2018s surface. The Subsidiary Lines which reside within\nthe larger grids, are normally in groups of 26 pairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Curiously, the\nsubsidiary lines are split midway be\u00adtween the larger grids, with 13 pairs\ntilted one way, and the rest tilted the other way. The exact angle of their\nradiation from the earth\u2018s surface can be measured us\u00ading the Lecher\nAntenna.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is&nbsp; this understanding of BEM grids that forms\nthe basis for designing in the ancient Vaastu texts. Ley Lines are invisible\nmeridians running across the planet and are found at sacred spaces and power\nspots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Earth is encircled\nwith energy lines, both horizontally and vertically, thus creating energy\ngrids. Hindu alchemist Maharishis recognized them as Mandalas. They went\nfurther in this discovery; they recognised the usage of individual Mandalas to\nfulfill specific purposes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earnest Hartman in 1967\nfound that diagonal patterns existed also and termed them as Hartman Grid. They\nfound that neurological disorders and cancers are due to sleeping on the\ncrossing of these lines. He worked out that there are certain energy fields on\nthe Earth that are responsible for the healthy body or the diseased body <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The neurological\nproblems are due to Earth energies and cross intersection of those lines. If\npeople are sleeping on intersection of those energy lines, and particularly if\nsome water stream is also passing through that crossing of lines, then that\nperson will have neurological problems, or neurological disorders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And if it is\nthe only energy line that is crossing and the person is sleeping on that -\nwhichever part is lying on that energy grid or the line crossing that will get\naffected negatively. To remain healthy, it is recommended to avoid using those\ncross-intersections of lines. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Hartmann said,\nproblems are only due to sleeping on the energy lines, which we call as\n'Marmasthan' in MahaVastu.&nbsp;&nbsp; However,\nVaastu Shastra goes into much more detail.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hartmann developed certain methods\nto detect those Earth energy lines and to avoid the intersections for sleeping\nand, you know, even if you puncture the intersections, the negative fields will\nbe created and negativity will be there in the space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu Shastra avoided\nthe Marmasthans, the sensitive points. Hartmann was able to detect those Earth\nenergy lines on the Earth only, but in MahaVaastu we have those formulae to\ncheck the energy lines even in the built up space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth is the\nmanifestation ground for desires of Universal Consciousness (Param Atma)\nthrough human consciousness (Atma). To manifest our purpose or core desire,\nnature, like a manager, facilitates all necessary powers and conditions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is the\nSanskrit&nbsp; for \u201cvital life\u201d. It is an\nauto-energizing force which creates a magnetic field and permeates each\nindividual as well as the Cosmos at all levels.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This self-energizing force is\nis the bond between the galaxies, the planets, humans and molecules which keeps\nthe whole Cosmos in order. All beings are born through it and live by it. When\nthey die, their individual breath dissolves into the cosmic breath. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans\nuse cosmic energy in their day to day activities. According to Vaastu Shastra,\nthere are invisible energy lines that run like a large grid across the Earth\nfrom North to South and from East to West.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The electromagnetic field thus\ngenerated affects the human body at the cellular level and controls the organs\nof the human body. It is believed that when a structure is placed on Earth, the\nequilibrium is affected because the physical structure causes a break in the\nelectomagnetic field.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence this equilibrium needs to be restored so that the\ncosmic energy or Prana&nbsp; (read\nelectromagnetic energy) flows harmoniously through the building as well as\naround it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the late 1970s,\nGerman physician Dr Ernst Hartmann developed an instrument, the Lobe Antenna,\nand discovered grids of energy lines emanating from the earth\u2018s surface and\ncircumscribing the globe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These grid lines are oriented in the north-south\ndirec\u00adtion at 2m intervals, and in the east-west direction at 2.5m intervals,\nand are now called the Hartmann Grid. The resulting energy field is termed\n\u201ctelluric\u201d Bio-Elec\u00adtro-Magnetic (BEM) energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The alignment of\nbuildings, materials and even the body with respect to these energies has a\ndistinct affect on the well-being of man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 4,000-year-old\nMenhirs, the megaliths dotting the surface of the earth from the Far East to\nIreland, were located specifically on the most negative energy nodes\n(intersections of BEM grids) so that their position, material and form together\ntransformed the negative telluric vibrational grids into positive fields.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nact like transmitters, radiating and affecting a vast area, a function they\nperform to this day. Similarly, Dolmens act as receivers. The pagan Romans\noriented all the buildings in their villages, towns and cities with respect to\nthe cardinal BEM grids. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All their roads of\nconquest followed large BEM grids, having energy lines (called Maximus\nMaximo\u00adrum) at distances of 2 to 3 km.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Romans manipulated\nthe grids to render them positive, thereby reducing fatigue amongst their\nmarching soldiers and charioteers as they walked their roads of conquest<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Jesus Christ was\ncooked up in 325 AD, by the Roman emperor,&nbsp;\nall pagan ( Hindu ) structures were Vaastu based.&nbsp; I have been to Rome and I have seen this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; It related to the golden mean of Sri Yantra .<br />\n<br />\nIn De divina he explores its relation to the five regular (or Platonic) solids: the cube, tetrahedron and octahedron (used by the Pythagoras who studied in Kodungallur University )<br />\n<br />\nThe Pythagoreans had assigned each figure to an element: the cube to earth; the tetrahedron to fire; the octahedron to air; the icosahedron to water; and the dodecahedron to heavenly ether. ( VAASTU stuff lifted and fudges ).<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli says he\u2019s included in his book all the material forms of geometric bodies which have \u2018hitherto been unknown to the living\u2019.<br />\n<br />\n\"The geometric expression of divine proportion involves three lengths and God also contains three (the Holy Trinity of Father, Son and Holy Ghost)\"--LIFTED FROM INDIAN TRINITY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli proposes a fifth, esoteric, quality shared by the divine proportion and the Christian God, which he derives from Plato: \u2018As God has conferred being to heavenly virtue as a fifth substance, and by means of this fifth substance has extended being to the other four simple bodies or four elements (earth, water, air and fire) and through these to every other thing in nature, so in our divine proportion, following the ancient Plato in his Timaeus, we give formal being to Heaven itself by creating for it the body called the dodecahedron or the body of twelve pentagons.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAYYYY !<br />\n<br />\nSORRY PLATO STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY AND HAD NO UNDERSTANDING OF WHAT HE STOLE AND PATENTED IN HIS NAME<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">1.618 IS CALLED THE VEDIC MEAN ( INHERENT IN SRI YANTRA )</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThief Leonardo da Vinci is the most overrated man on this planet\u2014so says Capt Ajit Vadakayil.<br />\n<br />\nLeonardo Da Vinci never actually built or tested most of his inventions --he just drew in a grander manner ( what he stole )<br />\n<br />\nLeonardo lifted from Ismail al-Jazari-- everything 100% of Al Jazari's works are patented from what Calicut king sold to him for gold.<br />\n<br />\nI wont waste my time over Al Jazari -- all you must know , is that his elephant clock is a water clock in the form of a Kerala elephant and Vishnu's Garuda in top. text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">STOP PRESS:</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Amartya Sen, SA Aiyar and Mani Shangaran Aiyaran went for dinner at a posh restaurant .</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">The soup arrived .</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Slimy Mani took the pepper shaker ( which said pepper on its cap ) and shook \u2013and what came out was salt\u2014making his soup too salty..</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Slimy Mani put all the blame on Narendra Modi and his ACHECHE DIN..&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">So the SA Aiyar and Amartya Sen, the world famous Rothschild stooge economists took it upon themselves to correct the situation.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">They debated for half an hour\u2014with Mani Shangaran Aiyaran offering this two paise worth every few seconds..</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Every sentence would start with I BELIEVE \u2013we must do this I BELIEVE we must do that.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Almost like OM at the beginning of a mantra.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Pretty soon they came up with a brilliant solution involving a napkin, 2 spoons, a straw, and an empty saucer. They called the waitress over to dazzle her with their brilliance.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">\u201cMa'am,\" Amartya Sen cried , frothing from the corner of his moth ( as usual )- \" WE BELIEVE that the pepper shaker contains salt . WE BELIEVE that the salt shaker contains pepper.\"</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">But before his could finish his stammering , the waitress leant over and in a smart movement interchanged the caps of the shakers. She just walked away.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/donald-trump-for-president-part-7-capt.html?showComment=1479904973823#c2320188926715773705\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 23, 2016 at 6:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_138MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">WE WANT AN INQUIRY OVER CLINTON FOUNDATION USING FORTIFIED RICE FOR AKSHAYA PATRA SCHEME IN INDIA</b></div>\n<br />\nZINC FORTIFIED RICE HAS BEEN USED IN PHILLIPINES TO REDUCE THE BRAINPOWER OF CHILDREN AND MAKE THE WOMEN INFERTILE &nbsp;. MODI WANTED THE SAME IN INDIA.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/gm-ir8-rice-high-amylose-content.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE DONT WANT WHITE MEN TO FEED INDIANS CHILDREN AND VACCINATE THEM USING THEIR TROJAN HORSE NGOs<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/autism-in-india-and-triple-vaccine-mmr.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIRON IN FORTIFIED RICE INVADES THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER<br />\n<br />\nIron by supplementation is toxic to the nervous system and is been linked to a variety of neurological conditions, from strokes to Alzheimer\u2019s and Parkinson\u2019s disease.Iron can easily lose or gain one electron going from the ferrous (Fe++) to the ferric (Fe+++) state, back and forth indefinitely. This is how it carries oxygen, for example.<br />\n<br />\nIt also means it can be a potent pro-oxidant \u2013 it catalyzes the production of free radicals which can destroy cells and tissue, and thereby contribute to cancer and heart disease. Almost all infectious agents including bacteria, fungi, and protozoa that cause disease require iron for their growth.<br />\n<br />\nWhen you have excess iron in your blood, the chemical reaction (Fenton's reaction) doesn't produce water.<br />\n<br />\nInstead, the excessive iron catalyzes the formation of hydroxyl free radicals, which are the most potent and destructive free radicals known to man. They will decimate your mitochondrial DNA, mitochondrial electron transport proteins and cellular membranes.<br />\n<br />\nIron overload accelerates every major disease we know of. That's how it causes the pathologies, especially in liver and cardiovascular disease.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />WHY DID THE GOVT ALLOW FOREIGN NGOs TO INTERFERE WITH FREE FOOD FOR CHILDREN IN SCHOOLS ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\nRemedy : if your iron level is high, ( take the serum ferritin test ) the solution is to simply donate your blood.<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS IN PMs AND HEALTH MINISTERs WEBSITES .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--sNIl7svTtM/WDWQRUEnTVI/AAAAAAABPUo/rATOLdQD1T01Hf8hoRg_GzDGa7MYVc3_gCLcB/s1600/20bg_bgkcd_Fort_GEWW2_3052454e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--sNIl7svTtM/WDWQRUEnTVI/AAAAAAABPUo/rATOLdQD1T01Hf8hoRg_GzDGa7MYVc3_gCLcB/s640/20bg_bgkcd_Fort_GEWW2_3052454e.jpg\" width=\"532\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iron Fortified food\ncontains too much iron \u2013and this &nbsp;damages\ncells in blood vessels. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iron is absorbed in the gut and stored in cells around\nour bodies for when it\u2019s needed. High doses can irritate the stomach lining\nbecause the gut can\u2019t absorb that much iron in one go.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid, a waste\nproduct which builds up and causes gout pain, is a response to iron overload \u2014\nuric acid binds with free iron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_143M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03524255706993518663\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Dharma Samsthapana</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/donald-trump-for-president-part-7-capt.html?showComment=1479907703159#c9154280893877415643\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 23, 2016 at 6:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_143MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nOMG ! this is absolutely mindblowing ,from a russsian blog<br />\n<br />\n[QUOTE]It is common knowledge in the archaeological community that the Parashurama Sutra, the basis of all government policy in the erstwhile Kerala kingdom of Vaazhappazhaa, contains the lines Sthulyam Kaamyunishancha kalanam brighahaha. The links between the ancient Russians and Indians almost certainly aided by the 60,00 odd scholars of the University of Vexalate (Sk. Vekhshalatha, Ru. Vekholotsla), in modern-day Central Afghanistan, in the 17th Century BCE, is said to have transferred political ideas through the land of the Vanga (Ru. Vangnya) in modern-day West Bengal.<br />\nThe Vishnu idol is depicted with a hammer in one left hand while the deconglated seventh arm on the right side holds a reticulated sickle. This hammer and sickle imagery is also found in the Parashurama Sutra, conclusively placing the origin of great and popular Russian political ideology in Vedic India.<br />\nThe Bringdunthaladeena Upanishad also mentions Kaamyunishcham in its list of land sacrifices, where under the directions of the King, all the land in the country was donated to the performance of sacrifices where Brahmins continuously tickled horny silk-rats (Gandharvamooshicam) until they collapsed in orgiastic exhaustion. The text also clearly identifies a group of scholars referred to as the Paalita Buryam, who oversaw the functioning of the King.<br />\nFor years, western historical study dominated by Greco-Capitalists, has sought to undermine the Vedic Indian contributions to what came to be 19th and 20th Century world politics. The Greco-Capitalists also attributed the ideology of Communism to the work done by Karl Marx, one of their own. It has been well documented that Marx indeed visited Kerala and West Bengal, and had thorough understanding of the Parashurama Sutra, a copy of which he picked up in the old-book-stall near the Cochin airport. Later on, as part of the larger Greco-centric Capitalist conspiracy, Marx took all the credit himself.<br />\nIn 1952 in Soviet Russia, an archaeologist, Prof. Varely Smirzkoff of Odessa University found artefacts near the ancient Belarussian town of Kozhikodz. He was the first to speculate that the ruling political ideology of his country could well have had its origins in Vedic India and not Modern Europe. Stalin funded Smirzkoff\u00e2\u2019s research until Smirrzkoff was suddenly found to have stolen over 500,000 paper clips from work over the course of his tenure at Odessa University. He was sent to Siberia, and with him went almost all academic proof that would have certainly brought Russia and India closer together.[/UNQUOTE]<br />\n<br />\nso jew karl marx copied Parashu rama's sutra and formed communism ?<br />\nhow did these bloody jews and goras stole all vedic texts ?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_143BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/donald-trump-for-president-part-7-capt.html?showComment=1479990215266#c8871307304114586712\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 24, 2016 at 5:53 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_228MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nPIZZAGATE, sometimes known as Pedogate, is not really about run-of-the-mill pedophiles in government and politics, film and TV.<br />\n<br />\nThe tabloid press has been full of reports about the rampant pedophilia that has always gone on in both realms. The pedophilia scandals that have rocked the USA are actually just a cover-up for something much more serious and sinister.<br />\n<br />\nMuch of the child trafficking is actually being conducted in the interest of (i) organ trafficking from young, healthy yet involuntary child donors, (ii) tissue harvesting from extremely young and/or euthanized infants and (iii) blood harvesting from the same.<br />\n<br />\nThankfully, a \u2018little\u2019 Hillary Clinton fiasco known as Benghazigate took place in 2012 which set the wheels in motion for PIZZAGATE to explode in the Alt-Media in 2016. Here\u2019s how it all unfolded:<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">Benghazigate Broke Open Emailgate,<br />Emailgate Broke Open Servergate,<br />Servergate and Emailgate Broke Open Weinergate,<br />Weinergate Broke Open Pizzagate</span><br />\n<br />\nBangladeshi banker Muhammad Yunis received 13 million USD in grants through State Department programs while Clinton was America\u2019s top diplomat.<br />\n<br />\nThe millions in funds were given to Yunus\u2019 Bangladesh-based Grameen Bank through 18 different U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) grants.<br />\n<br />\nNOBEL PRIZE WINNER MOHAMMAD YUNUS OF BANGLADESH IS A CRYTO JEW WHO HAS CONNECTIONS WITH VARIOUS ZIONIST JEW FOUNDATIONS. THERE ARE SEVERAL PICTURES OF HIM WITH THE CLINTONS<br />\nWHY DID MOHAMMAD YUNUS DONATE 3 LAKH US DOLLARS TO THE CLINTONS ?<br />\n<br />\nThe Clintons personally lobbied to press the Nobel Committee to award Yunus with the peace prize<br />\nClinton\u2019s aid to Yunus also included 18 grants, contracts and loans awarded to two of his America-based foundations, the Grameen Foundation USA and Grameen America. The Department of Treasury awarded a $600,000 grant directly to Grameen America under a fund designed to boost financial institutions in community development.<br />\n<br />\nWhen asked to explain the Yunus grants and loans, USAID Spokesman Raphael Cook said the agency didn\u2019t have the \u201cmanpower\u201d to respond to questions about the transactions. A series of Small Business Administration grants to Grameen America also began in July 2011, totaling $934,000. Those grants were for \u201csalaries and expenses\u201d for the foundation to operate its New York offices where Clinton once a U.S. senator.<br />\n<br />\nYunus was popular among elements of the Bangladesh military. When a group of generals overthrew the Bangladesh government in January 2007, Yunus considered establishing a new political party to lead the new military-led government, thereby legitimizing the coup.<br />\n<br />\nThe BBC reported April 7, 2007, that \u201cthe army would sponsor Nobel Peace prize winner Dr. Muhammad Yunus as a new leader.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSabir Mustafa, the BBC\u2019s Bengali Service editor, added that \u201cDr. Yunus is still viewed as a credible candidate by elements in the army.\u201d In the end, Yunus opted not to create the new party.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />DO YOU REMEMBER KACRAWAAL SAYING THAT ONLY NOBEL PRIZE WINNERS AND MAGSAYSAY AWARD WINNER CAN BE JURISTS IN JAN LOKPAL \u2013AND THAT FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs MUST BE EXEMPTED FROM JAN LOKPAL PURVIEW ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHEN WILL ROTHSCHILD ASK NOBEL PRIZE WINNERS KAILASH SATYARTHI AND JEWESS MALALA YOUSAFZAI TO FLOAT THEIR OWN Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/contempt-of-court-criminal-misuse-of.html?showComment=1479997877697#c1596760658001827276\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 24, 2016 at 8:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nThanksgiving Day is a national holiday celebrated in Canada and the United States.<br />\n<br />\nThanksgiving has been celebrated nationally on and off since 1789, after a proclamation by Adam Weishaupt ( George Washington.)<br />\n<br />\nIn 1614 a British expedition funded by Jews had landed in NE coast of USA . When they left they took 24 Indians as slaves and left smallpox blankets behind. Three years of plague wiped out between 98 per cent of the inhabitants of the coast, destroying most villages completely<br />\n<br />\nSix years later in mid-winter 1620 the English ship Mayflower landed on the North American coast, delivering 102 exiles.<br />\n<br />\nThe Europeans landed and built their colony called \u201cthe Plymouth Plantation\u201d near the deserted ruins of the Indian village of Pawtuxet.<br />\n<br />\nThey ate from abandoned cornfields grown wild. Only one Pawtuxet named Squanto had survived\u2013he had spent the last years as a slave to the English and Spanish in Europe\u2014and he was used as a language translator<br />\n<br />\nJohn Winthrop, a founder of the Massahusetts Bay colony considered this wave of illness and death to be a divine miracle.<br />\n<br />\nHe wrote to a friend in England, \u201cBut for the natives in these parts, God hath so pursued them, as for 300 miles space the greatest part of them are swept away by smallpox which still continues among them. So as God hath thereby cleared our title to this place, those who remain in these parts, being in all not 50, have put themselves under our protection.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn celebration of their good fortune, the colony\u2019s governor, William Bradford, declared a three-day feast of THANKSGIVING after that first harvest of 1621.<br />\n<br />\nThe colonists embraced a line from Psalms 2:8. \u201cAsk of me, and I shall give thee, the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS HAVE DELETED TRUE HISTORY<br />\n<br />\nNOT ANY MORE !<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />INITIAL WHITE SETTLERS HAD TO BE IMMUNE FROM SMALL POX ( HAVING SURVIVED THIS DISEASE IN EUROPE )</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BALLS TO WHITE MANs BRAVERY</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">BALLS TO HIS HONOUR</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />BALLS TO HIS WHITE JUSTICE</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIn US schools, students are taught that the Mayflower compact of Plymouth contained the seeds of \u201cmodern democracy\u201d and \u201crule of law.<br />\n<br />\nThe Puritan preachers said, from Romans 13:2, \u201cWhosoever therefore resisteth the power, resisteth the ordinance of God: and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">When\nthe initials settlers went by mayflower there was an abundance of Turkey in the\ndepopulated ( by small pox blankets ) area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nentire North American continent considered Turkey ( huexolotl) as a live saving\nbird<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Red Indians\nregarded the bird as a god. There were two religious festivals a year in the\nturkey's honor.( even to Aztecs )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like\nthe Aztecs to the south, the North American Indian tribes regarded the turkey\nas a powerful spiritual symbol. They prized its breast feathers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">King\nFerdinand sent out instructions that every Spanish ship returning from the New\nWorld should bring back ten turkeys, \"half males, and the other half\nfemales ...because I desire that there be bred here some cocks and hens of\nthose which you have there and were brought from Tierra Firme.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Portuguese\ncalled it the Peru bird ( Inca )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW Luis\nde Torres, a doctor who sailed with Columbus, called the bird tukki, ( Hebrew for\nBIG BIRD )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first\nthanksgiving dinner of the crew of Mayflower had American roast Turkey\u2014it was\nthe first fresh meat they has eaten in weeks<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;\nThey begane now to gather in ye small harvest they had, and to fitte up\ntheir houses and dwellings against winter, being all well recovered in health\n&amp; strenght, and had all things in good plenty; ffor as some were thus\nimployed in affairs abroad, others were excersised in fishing, aboute codd,\n&amp; bass, &amp; other fish, of which yey tooke good store, of which every\nfamily had their portion. All ye somer ther was no want. And now begane to come\nin store of foule, as winter approached, of which this place did abound when\nthey came first (but afterward decreased by degrees). And besids water foule,\nther was great store of wild Turkies, of which they tooke many, besids venison,\n&amp;c.UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-b6R2Ff_4uOI/WDcb1FGXdXI/AAAAAAABPXo/Ijds9hdMGE0pKxxmQ1ZLLNqbxbgyewL8gCLcB/s1600/6a0120a610bec488970c01543771e2da970c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"408\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-b6R2Ff_4uOI/WDcb1FGXdXI/AAAAAAABPXo/Ijds9hdMGE0pKxxmQ1ZLLNqbxbgyewL8gCLcB/s640/6a0120a610bec488970c01543771e2da970c.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bradford had \"sent four men\nfowling\" to find food, they came back with Turkey. The tradition is still\nrevered, and turkey is still served on thanksgiving day<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; The Mayflower was a 100-foot ship had 102\npassengers and a crew of 40 in extremely cramped conditions.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lNeBiFsDTH0/WDca-BJl-II/AAAAAAABPXg/BwAYS6MK14ENQuXwzfmTK-vWcDV7AD8qwCLcB/s1600/300px-Mayf99lowerHarbor.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"371\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lNeBiFsDTH0/WDca-BJl-II/AAAAAAABPXg/BwAYS6MK14ENQuXwzfmTK-vWcDV7AD8qwCLcB/s640/300px-Mayf99lowerHarbor.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_92M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html?showComment=1480087918590#c3157389110183790701\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 25, 2016 at 9:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_92MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.theguardian.com/environment/video/2016/nov/25/why-melting-arctic-ice-can-cause-uncontrollable-climate-change-video-report<br />\n<br />\nDESPITE WARNING MODI AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT RAISE MATHANE / NITROUS OXIDE AT PARIS COP 21<br />\n<br />\nJUST BECAUSE ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED MODI<br />\n<br />\nThere's a physical link between intense Monsoon over north-west India and the melting of Arctic ice, NCOAR - National Centre for Antarctic and Ocean Research,<br />\nhas declared this.<br />\n<br />\nNCOAR operates the Himadri Arctic research station in Spitsbergen, Norway<br />\n<br />\nWarm water currents move from tropics to the poles where they turn cold, increasing the salinity of oceans, causing water to sink and releasing heat. This keeps much of western Europe warm. But melting polar ice disrupts this cycle by flushing fresh water into the oceans at the poles. Due to this, salinity of oceans decreases, preventing warm water from sinking and releasing warmth. This results in cold waves across Europe. This water then travels southwards, increasing the temperature difference between land and oceans in the tropics, leading to changes in Monsoon patterns.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</span><br />\n<br />\nwe ask NCOAR not to do bullshit projects-- to justify their existance employment--<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE WATCHING NCOAR !<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ncaor.gov.in/iodps/currentprojects<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WARNED PMO , EIGHT MONTHS AGO -- THEY CALLED IT FICTION --<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.business-standard.com/article/news-ani/arctic-ice-melt-could-trigger-uncontrollable-climate-change-116112500552_1.html</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_97M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THEY ARE ALL A BUNCH OF FOUL LIES !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EXAMPLE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MY NEIGHBOUR DIED \u2013 A JAIN \u2013MY JUNIOR AT\nSCHOOL <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I was at sea. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>My Jain neighbour died of heart attack within 4 hours of me leaving home for the airport , to join a ship. &nbsp; If I were home, he would have never died--for I know how to do CPR and clear a clogged filter .</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Immediately after his father's death his mother got cancer .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So , when I came back from ship, I saw his 16 year\nold son moping around , &nbsp;I called him to the compound wall , and told him to be STRONG for his little 14\nyear old sister and his sick mother\u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I told him-- You have a toilet ( servants )\non your SOUTH WEST corner \u2013 we refer to in Kerala as KANNI MOOLA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I told him , Vaastu does NOT allow this -\n100% .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kanni Moola must be clean and land terrain raised\n\u2013 higher than the other 3 corners<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Within a hour , this boy had the toilet demolished. &nbsp; I guess this ritual made him mentally strong .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Later I went though several books and\ninternet sites. &nbsp; &nbsp;Most of them tell \u201c Use SW corner as a garbage dump\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Their reasoning is \u201c Since the SW corner\nexists as the asshole of the Vaastu Purusha , this is the right place to dump\ngarbage and build a shit pot toilet\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is why I have written a post on Sanatana Dharma \u2013which has now\nspilled over to 69 parts . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE POISON INJECTED\nINTO ANCIENT VAASTU RUNS SO DEEP THAT IN MANY INTERNET SITES AND BOOKS I FOUND\nTHIS &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">FOUL LIE </span></b>--&nbsp; \u201cOne should not sleep with the feet towards\nthe South, as it is considered a sign of disrespect to the elders\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The story of the origin\nof the VAASTU-Purusha is narrated in the Matsya-Purana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember he is NOT a\nmortal but a cosmic allegory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Idiots like Devdutt\nPattanaik , Amish Tripathi etc do not know that all Hindu gods are cosmic\nallegories on the macro/ micro scale. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only the human avatars\nof Lord Vishnu like Vamana, Parashurama, Rama, Krishna, Ayyappa are mortal. &nbsp;They subjected themselves to the law of Karma\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It takes some amount of\nbrains to understand the glory of Sanatana Dharma. People like BR Ambedkar, EVR\nPeriyar, UR Anantha murthy, Kalburgi, Pansare, Dhabholkar , Kancha Iliah squeak,\nJNU commies etc will never comprehend the glory of &nbsp;Hindusim\u2014which has ZERO superstition..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I myself had to learn\nquantum physics to understand Sanatana Dharma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is the lore-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once upon a time Lord\nShiva fought a battle against a monster named Andhak and killed him. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nbattle was long drawn, and Shiva sweated &nbsp;profusely. A drop of sweat fell on the ground\nand a humanoid figure was born out of that. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had a huge and a\nterrible body. He was also very hungry and started to drink the blood of the\nslain monster Andhak. Even after drinking the blood, his hunger was not\nsatiated and he went into a painful penance to appease Shiva &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He prayed to Lord Shiva to allow him to access\nto the three worlds. Lord Shiva was pleased with his penance and granted him\nhis wish. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as Lord Shiva\ngranted him his boon, the demon captured all the three worlds and started to\neat the earthlings.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This caused HAJAAAR &nbsp;panic amongst the gods and\ngoddesses, devas and asuras . &nbsp;They\napproached Lord Brahma for help. He told them to knock the demon down in prone\nposition. Accordingly the 45 major and minor gods felled him down.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 32 gods\nfrom outside and 13 gods from inside held him down. The names of 32 gods who\nheld him from outside are as follows \u2013 1) Eesh [Shikhi] 2) Parjanya 3) Jayant\n4) Indra 5) Surya 6) Satya 7) Bhrush 8) Aakash 9) Waayu 10) Poosha 11) Vitatha\n12) Bruhatkshat 13) Yama 14) Gandharva 15) Bhrungaraj 16) Mruga 17) Pitru 18)\nDouwarik 19) Sugreeva 20) Pushpadant 21) Varun 22) Asur 23) Shoka 24)\nPapyakshma 25) Roga 26) Ahi 27) Mukhya 28) Bhallat 29) Soma 30) Sarpa 31) Aditi\n32) Diti . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The above mentioned 32\ngods are outside the limits of the VAASTU (the building ), whereas the below\nmentioned 13 gods are within the limits of the VAASTU \u2013 1) Aap 2) Savita 3)\nIndra(with Jayant) 4) Shesha 5) Marichi 6) Savitri 7) Vivaswan 8) Vishnu 9)\nMitra 10) Rudra 11) Pruthvidhar 12) Aapvatsa 13) Brahma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these gods attacked\nthat demon and held him down by sitting on various parts of his body. Eesh\n(Agni \u2013 Fire) on the head, Aap on the face, Pruthvidhar and Aryama (Marichi) on\nthe chest, Aapvatsa on the chest, Diti and Indra on the upper arms, Som and Surya\non the right hand, Rudra and Rajyakshama(Papyakshma ) on the left hand, Savitri\nand Savita on the right arm, Vivaswan and Mitra on the stomach, Poosha and\nAryama (Marichi) on the wrist, Asur and Shesha on the left flank, Vitatha and\nBruhatkshat on the right flank, Yama and Varuna on the thigh, Gandharva and\nPushpadant on the knees, Sugreeva and Mruga on the lower legs, Douwarik and\nMruga on the feet, Jay and Satya on the hair on legs, and Brahma on the heart. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The captured demon was pinned down in this prone position. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said to the gods\nthat, since they have captured and tied him down, would they tell him as to how\nlong will he remain confined like this?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And what would &nbsp;he eat?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On hearing this\nthe gods said, \u201cToday is the third day after \u2018no moon\u2019 in the month of\nBhadrapada and the constellation is Vishakha. Hence you should lie down like\nthis and change your direction once in three months.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu is the ancient\nVedic science of buildings. Vaastu or elaborately Vastu Shaastra explains some\nof the basic principles which the architect of the building would have to keep\nin mind while designing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER PURANAS WERE\nWRITTEN DOWN FOR HINDUS WHO HAS NO ACCESS TO VEDAS. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN\nPURANAS GODS WERE PERSONALISED FOR QUICK COMPREHENSION .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ACCESS WAS RESTRICTED\nAS TRANSMISSION OF VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE COULD BE DONE ONLY BY HUMANS OF GREAT\nCEREBRAL MERIT .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE WAS NO WAY A\nHOSPITAL NURSE COULD DO BRAIN SURGERY, EVEN IF SHE THINKS THAT SHE COULD DO IT\nAFTER WATCHING IT AGAIN ND AGAIN A THOUSAND TIMES . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHAT IS THE GREATEST\nFEAT OF MANKIND ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IT IS THE TRANSMISSION\nOF VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 300 CENTURIES , BEFORE PENNING IT DOWN 70 CENTURIES\nAGO\u2014 &nbsp;WITHOUT LOSING A SINGLE SYLLABLE OR &nbsp;CORRUPTION OF TONE/ PITCH/ FREQUENCY .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large;\">Below: Every verse has unique swara / mudra / patha / ghana analogue protection- digital verification &nbsp;, &nbsp;the greatest feat ever by the human brain - to convey a verse for 300 centuries on oral route-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">-- and there were millions of them .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">The priceless Brahmanas ( Part &nbsp;2 ) and Aranyakas ( Part 3 ) of Vedas have been stolen by the white invader.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
