, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">A HOUSE CONSTRUCTED\nWITH VAASTU PRINCIPLES WILL HAVE GOOD CROSS VENTILATION AND SUNLIGHT WITHIN THE\nHOUSE</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">In cold places the home\ninterior must be warm and in hot places the home interior must be cool.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">It takes into account\nthe direction of breeze in that area where your home is . For example local seasonal\nwinds \u2014sea breeze/ land breeze. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It takes into account\nof the movement of the sun from Tropic of Cancer to Tropic of Capricon in a continuous\nmanner<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sun is overhead at noon\nonly of the Declination of the sun is same as the Latitude of your home. This means\nat noon a vertical stick will leave no shadow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your home is at a\nLatitude of greater than 23.4 degrees North / South , the sun will never be\noverhead at noon. &nbsp;The motion of the sun continuously\nfrom 23.4 N to 23.4 S is relative. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This\nhappens because the earth\u2019s axis &nbsp;is\ntilted to 23.3 degrees<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sun reaches Tropic\nof cancer on June 21<sup>st</sup> and reaches Tropic of Capricon in Dec 21<sup>nd</sup><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your home latitude\nis say in Caicut in Kerala , a place between Tropic of Cancer and Tropic of\nCapricon, the sun will be overhead TWICE , once on its way up and once on its\nway down.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the sun is overhead at\nnoon that day will be the hottest day. This is the day the declination of the\nsun is same as the Latitude of your home. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The declination of the\nsun is its Latitude on the celestial sphere. If you draw a line from the centre\nof earth to the centre of the &nbsp;sun, the\ndeclination is the Latitude where this imaginary line cuts the earth\u2019s crust (\nGeographical position ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN KERALA WE CELEBRATE VISHU , WHEN THE SUN IS EXACTLY OVERHEAD --&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">--OR WHEN DECLINATION OF THE SUN IS SAME AS LATITUDE OF &nbsp;MID KERALA</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">HOW MANY OF YOUR THINK\n, THAT BR AMBEDKAR , EVR PERIYAR TYPES UNDERSTAND ASTRONOMY \u2013 &nbsp;RAISE YOUR HANDS? </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\">COLD PLACE KEEP WARM.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastus shastra deals\nwith the eternal process of subtle energy manifesting as material space or\nform.&nbsp; It is the science of manifestation\nof energy into matter. &nbsp;If a part of the\nfree space is confined into a four-walled structure called a building, it becomes\na living organism and starts vibrating in a particular order.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nhas always been rooted in vibrations , frequencies and scalar energy .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\ninner and outer space resonate together in harmony, then peacefulness,\nvitality, health, prosperity, and creativity become an effortless experience.\nTo enable people to experience this supreme bliss in a mundane house is the main\npurpose of vaastu shastra\u2014to convert a house into a home.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVAASTU CHANNELS AND UTLISES POSITIVE ENERGIES AND WASTES\nNEGATIVE ENERGIES&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">READ THE BELOW FOR\nTIME PASS-&nbsp; THEY HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH\nVAASTU<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM A BIT BUSY</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/thumb-rules-for-strategies-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/thumb-rules-for-strategies-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is\nsteeped in DANCE BETWEEN TWO OPPOSING FORCES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our gods are all cosmic\nallegories\u2014personalised in puranas for the common man, who had NO access to the\nVedas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why we have DEVAS\nand ASURAS \u2013 CURSES and BOONS \u2013 all over our puranas .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma and Shiva are opposing\nforces with Vishnu as a mediator. This is the basis of Dvaita Vedanta template<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu is again a\nmediator who deals with two opposing forces ( energies ).&nbsp; The interaction of these two forces is cosmic\nordained and produces a third type of force, which is called \u2018Bio-Force\u2019 or\n\u2018Prana\u2019, needed for life to exist. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One type of force is\nsubtle and fine. The other is dark and dense. &nbsp;We call these opposing forces &nbsp;\u2018positive\u2019 and the other as \u2018negative\u2019. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\u2018Prana\u2019 is liberated by the interaction of\nthese forces. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the surface of the\nplanet , these forces continuously interact, releasing bio-energy. When a\nstructure is built over the surface of the planet earth , it comes in the way\nof THE natural interaction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both the forces enter the structure where the\ninteraction continues. However, the intensity of forces that enter the structure\nneed not be the same.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Depending on various factors like levels, water bodies,\ndoor placement etc., either the positive or the negative can have stronger\npresence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu is all about increasing PRANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The science of Vaastu\nguides you about the rules you have to follow so that the structure has a\npositive atmosphere\u2014so that PRANA can be maximized<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apart from protecting\nus from rain, hot sun, cold winds and other dangers, the house should offer us\nbetter health, wealth and prosperity- by action of PRANA \u2013 good cosmic energy. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sanatana Dharma recognizes that Prana includes\nenergies present in inanimate objects. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas deal with Prana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta expounds --Prana\n(inward moving energy), apana (outward moving energy), vyana (circulation of\nenergy), udana (energy of the head and throat), and samana (digestion and\nassimilation)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All over this planet we\nsee some ancient megalith structures. These were all created by ancient Hindus\u2014to\nchannelize prana to be congruent with the golden mean<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been ridiculed\nfor the post below- &nbsp;but this remains my\nbest post among 1060 odd posts. Idiots cannot write ancient history\u2014we don\u2019t have\na time machine, right ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A plot of land when\nencircled by a wall becomes 'Vaastu Mandala' just like a magnet when cut into\nsmall pieces have the same properties of the original one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Earth has a\nmagnetic field and the sun provides all the energy. So Vaastu in simple terms\nis the adjustments made in the structure of a building by which the positive\nenergy from these sources can be maximized<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Homes which have good\nprana , gets double or triple the price \u2013today view is NOT so important. People\nhave become wise</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The slanting sun rays\ntill pre-noon is a source of positive energy. &nbsp;Surya Namaskar does NOT work in the evening<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone asked me why SW\n( kanni moola ) is so important . Well this SW corner is ruled by RAHU which &nbsp;governs luck, finance, health and stability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3477752567470689011\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_43M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/vedic-cosmology-of-india-5000-bc-capt.html?showComment=1477837202587#c3477752567470689011\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 30, 2016 at 7:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_43MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT :<br />\n<br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO KNOW THIS<br />\n<br />\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC FORCES EXCEPT LAST FIVE VISHNU AVATARS OF VAMANA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA , KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nIDIOTS LIKE DEVADUTT PATTANAIK AND AMISH TRIPATHI DO NOT KNOW THIS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HINDUSIM DENIGRATING FOREIGN SPONSORED DUO IS BEING MONITORED BY OUR SECURITY AGENCIES.<br />\n<br />\nALL OUR PURANAS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nSAMUDRA MANTHAN GAVE US TWO IMPORTANT ENTITIES OF RAHU AND KETU-- ASURAS WHO TRIED TO SWALLOW SOME AMRIT INCOGNITO --<br />\n<br />\nTHERE CAN BE HINDU HOROSCOPE WITHOUT RAHU AND KETU<br />\n<br />\nIn Hindu astrology we leave out Uranus ( Shweta ) ,Neptune ( Shyama ) and Plutu ( Teevra ) as they are too far away to exert any major influence on humans and are also in one single rashi for too long.<br />\n<br />\nInstead we use the sun, the moon , Rahu and Ketu .<br />\n<br />\nThere is a fundamental difference between Rahu and Ketu and the other planets. The other planets are bodies of physical mass having form, shape, color, gravity, atmosphere, motion etc.<br />\n<br />\nRahu and Ketu are two imaginary points in the heavens without mass, shape or form. They are the points of intersection of the apparent path of the Sun with the path of Moon, and are called Chaya Grahas or Shadow planets..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism has amazing cosmic allegories woven into lore , for the simple common man to consume.<br />\n<br />\nNone of it is superstition.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO SUPERSTITION IN HINDUISM AT ALL.<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT CARE FOR ALL THESE DIMWIT \u201cEMINENT \u201c RATIONALISTS WHO COME ON TV.<br />\n<br />\nALL OF THEM CLUBBED TOGETHER , MULTIPLIED BY ONE MILLION, STILL CANNOT MATCH UP TO THE DIRT UNDER CAPT AJIT VADAKAYILs FINGER NAIL.<br />\n<br />\nSo what is ZE lore?<br />\n<br />\nAfter the Samudra Manthan effort or churning of the cosmic ocean by 54 Devas and 54 asuras , the God of Ayurveda Dhanwantari rose from the primordial ether .<br />\n<br />\nHe was 4 armed holding the Sudarsana Chakra weapon and Conch in the upper right and lefts hands. In the other two hands he carries a pot containing the nectar of immortality and a leech.<br />\n<br />\nThe Devas tried to vamoose with the nectar and the asuras gave it to them nice and proper, and snatched the pot away.<br />\n<br />\nThe divine eagle Garuda known to be large enough to block the sun ( a Vimana plane of Vishnu ) snatched the pot and flew away.<br />\n<br />\nWhile on the flight 4 drops fell on 4 places on earth- Prayag ( named by Muslim invaders as Allah- abad ), Hardwar, Ujain and Nasik.<br />\n<br />\nThese are the four spots the Kumbh Mela, the biggest pilgrimage show on earth is held, when about 80 million pilgrims take a dip in the holy river..<br />\n<br />\nHowever the asuras got hold of the pot again. GOTCHAA<br />\n<br />\nVishnu came in the guise of Mohini the beautiful dancer , distracted the asuras and melted away with the pot.<br />\n<br />\nShe distributed it among the devas without keeping anything for the asuras as per the original contract.<br />\n<br />\nHowever two clever asuras Rahu and Ketu came in disguise as devas and consumes the amrit.<br />\n<br />\nBefore the amrit went down them mangy throats Sun god Surya and moon god Chandra shouted to Mohini , to use the Surarshan chakra, the scalar vortex and cut off their heads, which she did in one shot.<br />\n<br />\nRahu and Ketu are the North and South Lunar nodes causing the sun and moon eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThe date of Kumbh at Haridwar falls when Jupiter is in Aquarius, and Sun and Moon are in the Aries and Sagittarius zodiacs respectively.<br />\n<br />\nAs Jupiter takes about 11 years, 10 months and 14 days to complete its revolution around the sun, its obvious that it comes back to any specific position on its orbit on completion of nearly 12 years.<br />\n<br />\nThus all these planetary configurations repeat every 12th year and, thus, Kumbh Mela also comes after the same interval. On the Kumbh Mela day Sages and holy sadhus converge from all parts of India.<br />\n<br />\nSage Varahamihira in Brihat Samhita ( 2660 BC ) devoted one chapter to Rahu and Ketu and considered them not any celestial physical body like other planets but as the nodes of the Moon, ie, points of intersection of orbits of the Moon and the Earth.<br />\n<br />\nThe north point of this intersection is called Rahu (north node) while the south point of that is called Ketu (south node).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_43BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_43b+seedvGqD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_41TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_41TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_41TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_43b+seedvGqD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_41TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_41TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_43b+seedvGqD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_41TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_41TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_41TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_43b+seedvGqD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_41B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/vedic-cosmology-of-india-5000-bc-capt.html?showComment=1477837217716#c4816125260891885492\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 30, 2016 at 7:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_41MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nIn Surya Siddhanta written 5500 years ago, they are considered as nodal points which are now known as Chaya Griha ( shadowy planets).<br />\n<br />\nSurya Siddhanta contains accurately, the diameter of the Earth, its circumference, eclipses, the number of days in a week, a month and a year. It gives the diameter of planets, and modern Trigonometry ( Sin/ Cos/ Tan/ Secant ) and Spherical trigonometry.<br />\n<br />\nThe average length of the tropical year is given as 365.2421756 days in Surya Siddhanta, which is only 1.4 seconds shorter than the modern value of 365.2421904 days, of the atomic clock age.<br />\n<br />\nThe average length of the siderial year or the actual length of the Earth's revolution around the sun, as 365.2563627 days, which is almost the same as the modern value of 365.25636305 days .<br />\n<br />\nSince then, Rahu and Ketu were deprived of the amrit by Sun and Moon sneaking , they developed bitter enmity against the Sun and the Moon.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points of the Moon what we call Rahu and Ketu are, clubs of magnetic and gravitational forces of two celestial bodies, the Moon and the Earth and hence are very influential on the life of mankind.<br />\n<br />\nThese points affect our central nervous system as well as sympathetic and para-sympathetic nervous systems which work on the principles of electro-magnetic systems.<br />\n<br />\nThey have direct impacts on the generation of signals of informations in neurons and neuro-transmitters and their movement from brain to various parts of our body and back to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points (Rahu and Ketu) are psycho-somatic which govern not only the stress level of our mind but also the activities of hormones, blood circulation and function of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild used his FAKE KaliDASA to inject poison into Rahu and Ketu in his FAKE work Uttar Kalamrita .<br />\n<br />\nKalidasa was a FAKE poet created and backdated by Jew Rothschild. NOT an astronomer.<br />\n<br />\nNorth node Rahu is like gravity- pulling us toward something whether we really want to or not, whether we have agency over this desire or not. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter in a natal chart.<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL ANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING CRITICAL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI MEDIA AND THEIR RATIONALIST STOOGES WERE RIDICULING OUR ISRO CHAIRMAN FOR PRESSING A BUTTON TAKING CARE OF RAHU KALAM AND FOR PRAYING AT A TEMPLE- BEFORE SENDING OUR ROCKET TO MARS .<br />\n<br />\nIF THE US PRESIDENT PRAYS IN A CHURCH, WWWOOOOH IT IS A DAMN GOOD THING RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS RUNNING AROUND NAKED DOING GRUNT GRUNT, WE ALREADY HAD OUR ASTRONOMICAL ALMANACS FOR SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Moon (Chandra) completes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of earth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at another time while travelling from north to south.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascending point is called \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have retrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<br />\n<br />\nIt has been established beyond doubt that Rahu and Ketu influence an individual\u2019s life, at times more than other planets.<br />\n<br />\nSince Rahu and Ketu are in exact opposition to each other, their effect should be considered simultaneously.<br />\n<br />\nRahu has the properties of Shani (Saturn) whereas Ketu has the influence of Mangala (Mars)<br />\n<br />\nThey indicate the precise point of the harmony with the three most important influences in our life- the Sun, the Earth and the Moon. This relationship plays an important part in the enfolding of individual consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nTheir role as Karmic indicators of our life is connected with their power to cause eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThe eclipses occur in the vicinity of Rahu Ketu during the Full Moon and the New Moon. (During New Moon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place. At the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse takes place.)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_41MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_41BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_41B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_42B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3404992833705932495\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_42M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/vedic-cosmology-of-india-5000-bc-capt.html?showComment=1477837232030#c3404992833705932495\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 30, 2016 at 7:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_42MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nAs they symbolically eclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part to play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal with the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<br />\n<br />\nThey have been given the status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed on eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThey have no substance and are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and spiritual significance.<br />\n<br />\nThey work in unison 180 degrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our lives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with their shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<br />\n<br />\nIt is always difficult to gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup. They effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at the time..<br />\n<br />\nKetu deals with the past Karma and Rahu with the future.<br />\n<br />\nThe five instincts that keep us attached to the materialistic purpose of life are Kaam (Desire, passions) Krodh (Anger) Madh (intoxicants- drugs, alcohol etc) Moh (Attachment) Lobh(Greed) and Matsaya(Jealousy).<br />\n<br />\nWe need to control our instincts rather than allowing ourselves to be controlled by them. Both Rahu and Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on these instincts- Rahu by exaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<br />\n<br />\nWe are tied down to the cycle of unhappiness and dissatisfaction as we cannot break away from our lower selves. We are born again and again to experience the pleasures and pains of the earthly life until we recognise them to be the illusions that they are.<br />\n<br />\nRahu Ketu deals with the inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to constantly make and the inner dilemmas.<br />\n<br />\nRahu takes people off their Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction. Ketu is considered the keeper of the book of our life- past and present Karmas.<br />\n<br />\nWhen all the planets are hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's south node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<br />\n<br />\nKalasarpa yogam is a karmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore .<br />\n<br />\nPeople go for Kalsarpa Shanti Pooja to Trimbakeshwar Temple at Nasik .<br />\n<br />\nA FAKE GURU AND A DROHI NAMED SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TWEETED AND TOLD ON NDTV, THAT LORD AYYAPPA ( 9TH AVATAR OF VISHNU ) IS A PRODUCT OF A HOMOSEXUAL UNION BETWEEN LORD SHIVA AND LORD VISHNU.<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS USED THE STORY OF MOHINI AND RAHU/ KETU TO LIE THAT SANATANA DHARMA SUPPORTS ANAL SEX --AND THAT VISHNU ( MOHINI ) AND SHIVA HAD ANAL SEX TO PRODUCE LORD AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs 9TH AVATAR )<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- VISHNU AND SHIVA ARE COSMIC FORCES-- VISHNU AVATAR AYYAPPA ( IMHOTEP ) WAS A MORTAL<br />\n<br />\nREAD THE STORY OF MOHINI IN THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/beyond-21st-dec-2012-opening-your-third.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_43b+seedvGqD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_43b+seedvGqD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; When North and South Pole is against\neach other, it attracts and we get sound and blissful sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/for-not-too-bright-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/for-not-too-bright-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nstresses on our body being exposed to the slanting rays of the rising sun\u2014with a\nfeeling of gratitude. Then chant Gayatri mantra facing the sun.&nbsp; This is NOT savage superstition as ridiculed by\nBR Ambedkar and EVR Periyar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">After noon until\nSunset, the immense heat of the Sun, which is not beneficial to us at all\nshould be avoided.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Shastra works on certain\nprinciples .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For example- \u2018Bhogadya\u2019, &nbsp;says that the designed premise must be useful\nand lend itself to easy application. &nbsp;\u2018Sukha Darsha\u2019, says that the designed premise\nmust be aesthetically pleasing. &nbsp;The\nproportions of the spaces and the material used, in the interiors and exteriors\nof the building ornamentation, color, sizes of the windows, doors and the rooms\nand the rhythms of projection and depressions should be beautiful. &nbsp;\u2018Ramya\u2019, says that the designed premise should\nevoke a feeling of well being and pride in the user. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any energy harming the\ncell (human) causing loss of prana is called negative energy. &nbsp;Vaastu Mandala have certain points known as\nmarma which are vital energy spots on which nothing should be built. They are\ndetermined by certain proportional relationships of the squares and the diagonals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism includes, not\nonly amazing spirituality , but a treasure trove of knowledge -- astronomy,\nastrology, grammar, mathematics, law, medicine, politics, diplomacy, war, love,\nyoga , philosophy , architecture and many other branches of knowledge. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is\nholistic. It is not just about bullshit theology like single holy book single\nmessiah religions..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu architecture\nalways begins by laying the cosmic body of God (purusha) over every building\nsite (mandala). This is call the Mandala Purusha.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most common\nfeatures of&nbsp; Hinduism is its tendency to\npersonify all things and so these forces are personified as Gods and given\ntheir proper \u201cseats\u201d in the various directions of Hindu architecture according\nto how they are positioned in the macrocosm, the greater universe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One should never hoard\nstale food, withered flowers, torn clothes, waste paper , waste materials,\nempty tins, old jars and useless things. These things prevent Lakshmi from\nentering the house.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the key features\nof some Hindus festivals is to discard useless things from inside the home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Vaastu\nShastra, adherence to Chanda would ensure an aesthetic looking building that is\npleasing to the eye. Chanda is the 'aesthetics of buildings'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastushastra\nessentially deals with two energy sources - the solar energy flux and the\ngeomagnetic energy flux.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The science of vastu\naims at controlling the flow of these energies in a vastu by selecting proper\ndirections and alignments for the vastu. Location of doors, windows, color\nscheme, flooring patterns, planting of trees - all these parameters play an\nimportant role in enhancing energy field for human being to live in harmony\nwith nature.&nbsp;&nbsp; The south, southwest and\nthe west are the directions subjected to excessive cosmic particle activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conventionally, the\nnorth is source and the south is the sink for electromagnetic flux lines. Sub\natomic particles travelling along the geomagnetic flux lines end up at the southern\ntip. Excessive cosmic radiation particles, particularly, positively charged\nparticles, enter the earth from the west rather than the east.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To contain these\nvortices of cosmic and thermal imbalances, vastushastra offers a remedy in the\nform of the Vedic helix concept.&nbsp; Golden\nhelix , the natural growth shape is known as the mystery and the magic of the\nalmighty.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It finds reference in all the\nancient scriptures as the centre of energy balance is located at the origin of\na a logarithmic helix fitted in a rectangle with sides having proportionate\ngolden ratio of 1: 1.618.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before planning any\nvastu, the plot should be demarked in the ratio 1:1.618 (length:breadth) known\nas the golden ratio.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A helix flowing from north east to south west should be\nmarked to fix the nabhi (energy centre) of the vastu.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nabhi is treated as\nthe brahamsthal (focal point) of the vastu and around this focal point,\nequidistant borderlines should be drawn. With nabhi as vastu centre, other\nrooms can be planned easily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two activities,\nbreathing of vastu and manifestation of energy, are centred around nabhi. If\nthe nabhi and brahamsthal of the vastu coincides, there is an enhancement of\nthe vital characteristics and virtues of the vastu.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The flaws in the vastu can\nbe traced to and technically analysed on the basis of the difference between\nthe nabhi and the brahamsthal of the vastu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the north east,\nnorth and east sides of the plot are provided with slopping terrain and then\nthe massiveness is increased systematically from south east to south west, with\na gradual rise towards the KANNI MOOLA (south west) &nbsp;and slope towards the north\neast, then the nabhi of such a plot acts as the centre of all energies emerging\nfrom the interior of the earth and other cosmic energies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This results in the\ncreation of an envelope of life sustaining energy vibrations around the entire\nvastu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-thXFuAhatnA/WDLQxuFHHQI/AAAAAAABPQo/U7bVSkSTotwP8LYp3LTRSGdr6z2V95wMQCLcB/s1600/hel55Gix.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-thXFuAhatnA/WDLQxuFHHQI/AAAAAAABPQo/U7bVSkSTotwP8LYp3LTRSGdr6z2V95wMQCLcB/s400/hel55Gix.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raising of the plinth\nin the south direction, having a underground water tank or open water body in\nthe north, east or northeast direction and all such tenets of vastu planning,\nhelp to achieve the golden ratio and implement the helix concept in a house.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nfew predominant effects are -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Interrupting the\nsouth pingala current flow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Achieving energy-mass\nbalance through, proportionate compensation for geomagnetic and energy\ndisturbances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Augmenting the north\nida current flow, bestowing the vastu with drive bliss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Regulating the\nexcessive southern zone temperatures through water vapour emission processes of\ntrees like nilgiri and neem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Creating healthy\natmosphere in the house through the scent and aroma of herbal plants.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the goals of\nVaastu in designing, is to restore balance between the building structure and\nthe cosmos because when buildings echo the underlying cosmic principles, they\nvibrate in harmony with the universe and these vibrations affect the inmates in\na positive way creating peace, prosperity and contentment in their lives. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why in Vaastu the golden mean 1.618\nand golden helix is incorporated.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Shastra\nprescribes an ideal plan called the \u201cVastu Purusha Mandala\u201d to ensure that the\n\u2018prana\u2019 or \u2018cosmic energy\u2019 moves smoothly through a building and around it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost every creature\non Earth ( unless you are a nocturnal creature ) starts it\u2019s activities at\nsunrise and goes to sleep after sunset and therefore the Sun, assumes a lot of\nimportance to living things.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of the\nimportance of sunlight to humans, the main aim of Vaastu Shastra is to ensure\nthat the inmates of a house are inadvertently exposed to the useful rays of\nsunlight while performing their daily activities, even if they are inside the\nhouse the whole day.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But during a day,\npeople perform different activities in different rooms at different times and\nthe Sun\u2019s position keeps changing from sunrise to sunset&nbsp; . The slant also changes depending on the\ndeclination of the sun and the latitude of your home.&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;So to ensure that the inmates get exposed to\nsunlight constantly, each room in the Vaastu Mandala is positioned so that it\nfaces the Sun at the time of the day when it is most likely to be used by them.\nAnd in cold places , maximum exposure to sunlight.&nbsp; In hot places less exposure to the sun after\nnoon till sunset.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are five\nfundamental principles on which \u2018Vaastu Shastra\u2019 stands and they are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Site orientation \u2013 also\ncalled Diknirnaya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Site planning \u2013 also\nknown as Vaastu Purusha Mandala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proportions of the\nbuilding \u2013 also known as Maana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dimensions of the building\u2013\nalso called Aayadi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aesthetics of the\nbuilding \u2013&nbsp; also known as Chanda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Guideline | Site\nLocation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Guideline | Site\nShape<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Guideline | Site\nOrientation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The science of vaastu aims at controlling the flow of\nthese energies in a vaastu by selecting proper directions and alignments for\nthe vastu.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Factors | Earth\u2019s\nEnergy Fields<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaastu rests on the\nassumption that the Earth is a living organism out of which other living\ncreatures and organic forms emerge, and so every particle on Earth possesses\n\u2018live energy\u2019. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life on Earth is\npossible because of the five basic and essential elements known as the\n\u2018Panchabhutaas\u2019. They are Aakaasha (Space), Vaayu (Air), Agni (Fire), Jala\n(Water) and Bhoomi (Earth).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the blazing desert,\nwhere the heat of the Sun (Fire) can make it impossible to live, man has built\nhouses with internal courtyards (Space), thick walls (Earth), slit windows\n(Air) and water bodies and fountains (Water) to cool the house by ensuring good\nventilation and flow of air<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Living things \u2013\nanimals, insects, birds, plants and humans have for millenniums manipulated the\n5 elements to create comfortable dwellings or environment, as explained below. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals, Birds,\nInsects, Plants \u2013 have natural defenses against a wide variety of unfavourable\nclimates. They adapt their body size, shape or temperature to adjust with the\nhostile climate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wisdom in ancient India\nwas derived from nature. &nbsp;When princes\nwere mentored by Gurus, they were made to derive their own answers after analyzing\na situation , instead of readymade answers being shoved down their throats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But unfortunately\ntoday, man gives precedence to the appearance and size of his house as his\nsocial position and personal ego are more important. He makes homes for other\nto gape at NOT for him to live in.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the process he has\nforgotten to manipulate the elements to create a naturally comfortable, airy\nhouse. To create comfort he is forced to use gadgets like Fans, Air\nConditioners, Heaters etc which consume so much of energy and are unhealthy too\nby EMF pollution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
