text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9bZkp7q19f0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9bZkp7q19f0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the breast is\nstimulated, &nbsp;prolactin levels in the\nblood rise, peak in about 45 minutes, and return to the pre-breastfeeding state\nabout three hours later. &nbsp;The release of\nprolactin triggers the cells in the alveoli to make milk. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin also transfers to the breast milk. &nbsp;&nbsp;Prolactin in milk is greater at times of\nhigher milk production, and lower when breasts are fuller, and that the highest\nlevels tend to occur between 2 a.m. and 6 a.m.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the hormones,\nsuch as ACTH , growth hormone, and prolactin, follow a circadian rhythm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/pineal-gland-third-eye-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/pineal-gland-third-eye-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At birth, prolactin\nlevels remain high, while the delivery of the placenta results in a sudden drop\nin progesterone, estrogen, and HPL levels. This abrupt withdrawal of\nprogesterone in the presence of high prolactin levels stimulates the copious\nmilk production of secretory activation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once a woman is\nconditioned to nursing, let-down can be triggered by a variety of stimuli,\nincluding the sound of her baby. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Even\nthinking about breastfeeding can stimulate this reflex, causing unwanted\nleakage, or both breasts may give out milk when an infant is feeding from one\nbreast</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a new mother\nnurses her baby, hears her baby or plays with her baby, nervous signals are\nsent from the nipples to the hypothalamus. This causes a surge in the levels of\nprolactin released, which lasts for about a hour.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin makes the mammary glands secrete\nmilk into the alveoli. If the surge is absent or blocked as a result of\nhypothalamus or pituitary gland damage, or if nursing does not continue; the\nbreasts start to lose their ability to produce milk in about a week or two.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again . high prolactin\nlevel (hyperprolactinemia) is one of the causes of infertility in women and\nmen.&nbsp;&nbsp; Prolactin is one of the hormones\nthat is produced in the front portion of the pituitary gland (anterior\npituitary gland) which lies at the bottom of the brain. This hormone is\nproduced both in women and men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE HUMAN BODY REPAIRS ITSELF DURING REM SLEEP. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE BRAIN IS THE ULTIMATE PHARMACY.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THERE IS NO NEED FOR DOCTOR , THE BODY KNOWS WHAT TO DO.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EVIL PHARMA DOES EVERYTHING IN THEIR POWER TO DEPRIVE YOU OF REM SLEEP.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_74B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unexplained headache<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visual impairment</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seizures<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin can be\nmeasured with a simple blood test drawn.&nbsp;\nIn order to get accurate results, prolactin should be drawn first thing\nin the morning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The woman should have\nhad nothing to eat from the night before and should avoid any stimulation of\nthe breast or nipples from the day before also.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin should also\nbe drawn early in the menstrual cycle before ovulation. This is because\nprolactin levels are naturally higher after ovulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The normal prolactin\nlevel range in both Men and women are as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men: 2 \u2013 18 ng/mL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-Pregnant Women or\nNon Breastfeeding Women: 2 \u2013 29 ng/mL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pregnant Women: 10 \u2013\n209 ng/mL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: ng/mL means\nnanograms per milliliter<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A prolactin level above 250 \u03bcg/L most often\nindicates a prolactinoma. However, some drugs can cause levels to be that high.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normal prolactin levels\nranges may vary slightly among different laboratories. Some lab use different\nmeasurements or may test different specimens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/prolactin-oxytocin-dopamine-child.html?showComment=1479128581718#c3570210617715996932\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 14, 2016 at 6:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_146MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi bz,<br />\n<br />\nZinc tends to work together with vitamin B6 in the human body..<br />\n<br />\nZinc deficiency is one of the causes of high levels of prolactin in men, especially among bodybuilders and athletes.<br />\n<br />\nZinc inhibits the production of prolactin, the hormone that can disrupt sexual function. High zinc levels also mean lower levels of estrogen and prolactin thereby reducing the risk of prostate disease. Zinc lower prolactins levels by almost 50% in men.<br />\n<br />\nVitamin B6 recommended in cases of high levels of prolactin. Vitamin E is another supplement that can inhibit central prolactin secretion.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_147b+seedap-gD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_147b+seedap-gD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin can become\ntoo high because of a disease or the use of certain medications. Often, the\ncause is a prolactin-making tumor on the pituitary gland, called a\nprolactinoma. This tumor is almost always benign, meaning not cancerous. It is\nmore common in women than men.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin lowers levels\nof sex hormones (estrogen and testosterone) in both men and women.&nbsp; Too much prolactin and the resulting drop in\nestrogen or testosterone can lead to sexual and menstrual dysfunction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone with a large\nprolactinoma may have headaches and/or vision problems. This is because the\noptic nerve, which is needed for sight, is near the pituitary gland and may be\ninjured by a large tumor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people with\nhyperprolactinemia have no symptoms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One cause or excess prolactin\nis an underactive thyroid (hypothyroidism), so you may have a blood test to\ncheck your thyroid hormone levels. If the doctor thinks you may have a\nprolactinoma or other pituitary tumor, you likely will get an MRI (magnetic\nresonance imaging) scan of the brain and pituitary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolactin secretion in\nthe pituitary is normally suppressed by the brain chemical, dopamine. Drugs\nthat block the effects of dopamine at the pituitary or deplete dopamine stores\nin the brain may cause the pituitary to secrete prolactin</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, prolactin requires the\nstimulation of the nipples from a suckling baby for the signal to reach the\nbrain to produce more of it. This is done by mechanoreceptors that are\nconnected by neural circuitry to cells in the pituitary.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Prolactin release</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">depends on dopamine, so the signal sent to\nthe hypothalamus actually inhibits dopamine secretion. This allows prolactin\nproduction to continue unabated.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine and\ntestosterone are intimately linked hormones. When one is high, the other will\nbe high.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">High dopamine also correlates\nto lower levels of prolactin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Z_91bUc2-Hc/WCncxLpYqdI/AAAAAAABPKI/CUVuFDNN7Ywcgj9u9E_uofQ7C7RMT2b5wCLcB/s1600/sexualfunctionacrosslifecyclrrrreinwomenppt-4-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a clear reason why so many bodybuilders\nconsider it their divine duty to keep prolactin levels low, as this implies\nthat dopamine levels will be high and hence testosterone levels as well.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cabergoline was\noriginally designed as a treatment of medical problems related to the hormone\nprolactin. Used to treat menstrual irregularities and fertility problems,\ncabergoline is also commonly used by bodybuilders in combination with other\nsupplements and products for increased muscle mass without adding excess body\nfat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bodybuilders use\ncabergoline to control gynecomastia that prevents the negative effects of\nprolactin on muscle development through the use of anabolic steroids.\nGynecomastia is a common disorder of the endocrine system in which there is a\nnon-cancerous increase in the size of male breast tissue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lowering your elevated\nprolactin levels will result in elevated testosterone and avoiding gynecomastia.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Hypothyroidism results in increased\nlevels of thyroid-releasing hormone in the body, which may in turn increase\nsecretion of prolactin and thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your dietary and\nlifestyle may be disturbing your hormonal balance.&nbsp;&nbsp; Drugs prescribed for psychiatric and\ndigestive problems also cause higher prolactin levels.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antipsychotic\nmedications are mostly employed for treating auditory hallucinations. They\naffect the dopamine metabolism that fixes the problem<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine has been\ndocumented in excessive amounts not only in schizophrenics, but in people\nexperiencing drug-induced hallucinations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When dopamine is\nreduced to normal levels through medication, this often causes a significant\nreduction in hallucinations or at least a decrease in their intensity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide increases\ndopamine and serotonin release<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is the\n\"feel-good\" hormone with amazing effects: high attention, improved\nshort-term memory, elation, boldness and a temporary desire to explore the\nworld and take risks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dopamine released\nduring orgasm is equal \"in effect\" to one shot of heroin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No wonder it's the hormone that causes\naddiction: when the body releases a high dosage of dopamine, it will take\nhours, days or weeks, before it gets back to its sober state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian Tantra stressed\nthe importance of non-orgasmic sex, or at least delayed orgasm, to avoid the\npeak of dopamine, while enjoying the hours-long pleasure from a moderate\ndopamine dose, not the few seconds of a heroin-like orgasm with aftermath\neffects. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lovers shouldn't consummate affection immediately; they can maintain\ntension, distance and curiosity, to keep dopamine levels high, and love flame\nburning. &nbsp;This is one of the magic effects of pilgrimage to Sabarimala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is not the\nonly hormone that causes happiness, yet it's the one that knows how to\n\"advertise\" best for itself, by constantly urging you to repeat a\ncertain behavior over and over, even while you see its damaging effects\ndestabilizing your life.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is less about\nseeking pleasure than avoiding pain (aversive motivation), which is still\nvital, however, for basic survival needs (food, reproduction, etc.).\nThankfully, our body produces other hormones giving a deeper, longer pleasure,\ncounterbalancing the addictive nature of dopamine, like serotonin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manufactured serotonin\nis usually prescribed as an antidepressant, and as a great tool for fighting\naddiction with, helping one regain self-control and boost one's willpower and\nsense of well-being.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is a\ndouble-edged sword: the intense pleasure, or thrill, it offers is addictive,\nhowever rewarding/motivating it is. In fact, it turns any habit into an\naddiction, depending on frequency and dosage. Because natural dopamine\nstimulants are many and mostly unavoidable, we can't help acquiring new habits.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine diversifies\npleasure, creating mere pleasures \"by association,\" that are not\ncaused by a typical pleasing sensation, but by something else happening\nsimultaneously. The brain then makes a subconscious connection between the two,\ninterpreting a behavior as \"pleasurable &amp; worth repeating.\" This\nfurther complicates people's tastes and strengthens their habits.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"reward\ncenter\" is the part of the brain dopamine activates when a goal is\nachieved. The propagation of genes required having many different partners; so\nan exhausted male who has just had sex with a female, will not mind mating\nagain with any number of females, provided they are all new. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A NEW\n\"HARD-TO-GET\" PARTNER IS ALWAYS SEXY--- because it makes body\ndopamine surge high, going on that highs-and-lows roller-coaster again and\nagain. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;First-sight love is a pure\ndopaminergic urge, that may/may not develop into mature love.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is released\nafter surviving a great risk /loss /danger. Now you know why Russians played\nRussian Roulette.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-as-TqDJAY68/WComUfl-qxI/AAAAAAABPKg/_zetkvFiIlwJ63KIGJZFNrlOVG-zYsgcACLcB/s1600/b1a5EEEEEE5720e2bbe5675d01846524c8368f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-as-TqDJAY68/WComUfl-qxI/AAAAAAABPKg/_zetkvFiIlwJ63KIGJZFNrlOVG-zYsgcACLcB/s400/b1a5EEEEEE5720e2bbe5675d01846524c8368f.jpg\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parkinson's disease\noccurs when nerve cells, or neurons, in an area of the brain that controls\nmovement become impaired and/or die. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally,\nthese neurons produce &nbsp;dopamine, but when\nthe neurons die or become impaired, they produce less dopamine. This shortage\nof dopamine causes the movement problems of people with Parkinson's. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, dopamine is a\nchemical messenger, or neurotransmitter. Dopamine is responsible for\ntransmitting signals between the substantia nigra and multiple brain regions.\nThe connection between the substantia nigra and the corpus striatum is critical\nto produce smooth, purposeful movement.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loss of dopamine in this circuit results in\nabnormal nerve-firing patterns within the brain that cause impaired movement.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N_2Mi6EroU8/WColGrIbIBI/AAAAAAABPKc/rXbGpMBOXP8SqFSMRKnhO4LkCiwwiFhbACLcB/s1600/HappFFy-Chemicals.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N_2Mi6EroU8/WColGrIbIBI/AAAAAAABPKc/rXbGpMBOXP8SqFSMRKnhO4LkCiwwiFhbACLcB/s400/HappFFy-Chemicals.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">SO SO\nSO<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; border: 1px solid black; color: black; display: inline-block; height: 1.5em; margin: 1px 0px; text-align: center; width: 1.5em;\">&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;Jurisdiction with legal non-psychoactive medical cannabis.</div>\n<div class=\"legend\" style=\"background-color: #f9f9f9; text-align: center; width: 1.5em;\">&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;Jurisdiction with decriminalized cannabis possession laws.</div>\n<div class=\"legend\" style=\"background-color: #f9f9f9; color: #252525; font-family: sans-serif;\">\n<span class=\"legend-color\" style=\"background-color: #d0d1e6; border: 1px solid black; color: black; display: inline-block; height: 1.5em; margin: 1px 0px; text-align: center; width: 1.5em;\">&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;Jurisdiction with cannabis prohibition.</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5362161165339984992\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_75M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html?showComment=1479182613139#c5362161165339984992\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 15, 2016 at 9:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_75MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDONALD TRUMP<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE OF USA WANT TO SEE <b><span style=\"color: red;\">QUICK WINS </span></b>( <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">LIKE MODIs SWATCH BHARAT , WHICH WAS FIRST PROPOSED BY THIS BLOGSITE </span></b>)<br />\n<br />\nMAKE LEGALISING MEDICAL MARIJUANA , YOUR QUICK WIN. THIS WILL KILL ROTHSCHILDs EVIL PHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nHILLY BILLY YANKS ARE MORE AWARE, THAT IS WHY THEY IGNORED MAIN STREAM MEDIA PROPAGANDA AND ELECTED YOU.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA WE SAY THAT CANNABIS IS LORD SHIVAs PLANT .<br />\n<br />\nBEWARE, --<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />EVIL PHARMA NOW HAS A NEXUS WITH GM COMPANIES OF JEW ROTHSCHILD \u2026<br /><br />PLANS ARE UNDERWAY TO DO BIOENGINEERING AND MAKE THIS PLANT USELESS.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nINDIAN MARIJUANA IS THE BEST ON THIS PLANET. WE HAVE IT AS BHAANG ON HOLI.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://www.thecannabist.co/2016/11/14/marijuana-legalization-election-2016-tipping-point/67407/</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-91k5eWjfGGw/WCqLKqhI00I/AAAAAAABPK4/RpIBV6e9N0I9IqbFmRNc0dgC37ULChTyQCLcB/s1600/bi-graphidrrcs_marijuana%2Bmap%2B%25281%2529.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"578\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-91k5eWjfGGw/WCqLKqhI00I/AAAAAAABPK4/RpIBV6e9N0I9IqbFmRNc0dgC37ULChTyQCLcB/s640/bi-graphidrrcs_marijuana%2Bmap%2B%25281%2529.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\">EVIL PHARMA AND THEIR SLAVE DOCTORS HAVE GIVEN MEDICAL MARIJUANA A BAD NAME. &nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EVERY MEDICAL RESEARCH REPORT IS FALSE --A KOSHER LIE .</span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human Beings have an\nAutonomic Nervous System (ANS) that is actually comprised of three separate\nsubsystems, the Parasympathetic Nervous System (PNS), the Sympathetic Nervous\nSystem (SNS) and the Enteric Nervous System (ENS). <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cypwIMMv-p4/WCqyYKvsXFI/AAAAAAABPLQ/4EmPvnkozrc_ELCET3qDQP38u-c22090wCLcB/s1600/vagus-nerve-d88image.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cypwIMMv-p4/WCqyYKvsXFI/AAAAAAABPLQ/4EmPvnkozrc_ELCET3qDQP38u-c22090wCLcB/s640/vagus-nerve-d88image.jpg\" width=\"580\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The enteric nervous\nsystem has been described as a \"second brain,\" which communicates\nwith the central nervous system (CNS) through the parasympathetic (e.g., via\nthe vagus nerve) and sympathetic nervous systems.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, vertebrate studies\nshow that when the vagus nerve is severed, the enteric nervous system continues\nto function.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S4ndRHnReOw/WCqyLmlLlWI/AAAAAAABPLM/D2dk3_eAJJkc8a6PCl5X1hZ0mdFNEYqnACLcB/s1600/Vagus-Nerve--5ff70x456.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S4ndRHnReOw/WCqyLmlLlWI/AAAAAAABPLM/D2dk3_eAJJkc8a6PCl5X1hZ0mdFNEYqnACLcB/s640/Vagus-Nerve--5ff70x456.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We now know that the\nENS is not just capable of autonomy but also influences the brain. In fact,\nabout 90 per cent of the signals passing along the vagus nerve come not from\nabove, but from the ENS and that is why many consider it as a backup brain centered\nin our solar plexus. &nbsp;&nbsp;Our gut instincts\nare not fantasies but real nervous signals that guide much of our lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/gut-feeling-and-intuition-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/gut-feeling-and-intuition-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is our vagus nerve\nthat provides the gateway between the two parts of the autonomic systems. The\nvagus acts as a bio-informational data bus that routes impulses going in two\ndirections.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Cp7vrX5U_5k/WCqyq5FgcuI/AAAAAAABPLU/a8CbmAW1NGE8MQC--YiabbRiDo7BBTyDACLcB/s1600/sli999de1_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Cp7vrX5U_5k/WCqyq5FgcuI/AAAAAAABPLU/a8CbmAW1NGE8MQC--YiabbRiDo7BBTyDACLcB/s1600/sli999de1_1.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the vagus nerve acts as the central switchboard it should\ncome as no surprise that impaired functioning of this one nerve can lead to so\nmany different conditions and problems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some neurological diseases actually\ncome up from the gut spreading to the brain via the vagus nerve.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8sDVrXMtvio/WCqxO2YLWNI/AAAAAAABPLI/cr4nuiMiwck27cHK4j66kp9jQNBRy91kACLcB/s1600/anatomic-differensssdces-in-sympathetic-and-parasympathetic-divisions.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"450\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8sDVrXMtvio/WCqxO2YLWNI/AAAAAAABPLI/cr4nuiMiwck27cHK4j66kp9jQNBRy91kACLcB/s640/anatomic-differensssdces-in-sympathetic-and-parasympathetic-divisions.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vagus nerve is the\ncommander-in-chief when it comes to having grace under pressure. The autonomic\nnervous system is comprised of two polar opposite systems that create a complementary\ntug-of-war, &nbsp;(<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SAMUDRA MANTHAN ON MICRO\nSCALE</b> ) which allows your body to maintain homeostasis (inner-stability). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The autonomic nervous\nsystem plays an essential role in keeping the body's internal environment\n(temperature, salt concentration, blood sugar, oxygen and carbon dioxide level in\nblood, etc) in proper balance, a condition called homeostasis. The autonomic\nnervous system also plays a major part in emotional experience and expression. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-P-Cn_zKJx5I/WCq0jkRjCMI/AAAAAAABPLk/q73NnnAJFPkCybzffqJpaY6H0_Tpn7BMgCLcB/s1600/VaguFFs%2BNerve.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-P-Cn_zKJx5I/WCq0jkRjCMI/AAAAAAABPLk/q73NnnAJFPkCybzffqJpaY6H0_Tpn7BMgCLcB/s1600/VaguFFs%2BNerve.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are\nemotionally excited, the body shows many changes: blood pressure and heart beat\nincrease, mouth is often dry, stomach has \"butterflies\" in it. These\nand other body actions are controlled by the autonomic nervous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The autonomic nervous\nsystem also has two divisions: the sympathetic division and the parasympathetic\ndivision. These two divisions have antagonistic (opposing) effects on the\ninternal organs they innervate (send nerves to = act on).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sympathetic\ndivision, &nbsp;is the emergency system. It\nprepares the body to put out energy and to protect it from effects of injury.\nIt shuts the gut down, speeds up the heart, increases blood pressure, dilates\n(makes bigger) the pupils of the eyes, makes more glucose (blood sugar)\navailable in the blood for energy, etc. &nbsp;&nbsp;These are &nbsp;reactions &nbsp;for fight or flight <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parasympathetic\ndivision, &nbsp;is the\n\"housekeeping\" division. It acts to replace and recover from the\nactivities of living. Its action is (almost always) the opposite of the\nsympathetic division. It activates the gut for digestion, slows the heart rate,\ndecreases the blood pressure, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The sympathetic nervous\nsystem is geared to rev you up like the gas pedal in an automobile \u2013 it thrives\non adrenaline and cortisol and is part of the fight-or-flight response. The\nparasympathetic nervous system is the polar opposite.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QcLpAPMeWKM/WCq0Quc03pI/AAAAAAABPLg/QZSYAFNncUYh5QvC2BpFmd27g1Bngw0KACLcB/s1600/F1999.large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QcLpAPMeWKM/WCq0Quc03pI/AAAAAAABPLg/QZSYAFNncUYh5QvC2BpFmd27g1Bngw0KACLcB/s640/F1999.large.jpg\" width=\"536\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The vagus nerve is\ncommand central for the function of your parasympathetic nervous system.\nUnfortunately, the vagus nerve\u2019s reflexive responses can backfire and turn it\nfrom comrade into saboteur.\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vagus nerve is\nknown as the \"wandering nerve\" because it has multiple branches that\ndiverge from two thick stems rooted in the cerebellum and brainstem that wander\nto the lowest viscera of our abdomen touching our hearts and most major organs\nalong the way. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vagus nerve uses\nthe neurotransmitter, acetylcholine.&nbsp; If\nour brain cannot communicate with our diaphragm via the release of\nacetylcholine from the vagus nerve then you will stop breathing. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5TL5j0xx8Hc/WCq091PnEYI/AAAAAAABPLo/ZFcOvZgJeU4WzfZCZTzRoyvtpJDpilTxQCLcB/s1600/imaRRges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"173\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5TL5j0xx8Hc/WCq091PnEYI/AAAAAAABPLo/ZFcOvZgJeU4WzfZCZTzRoyvtpJDpilTxQCLcB/s400/imaRRges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">INDIAN YOGIS STUNNED THE WHITE MAN BY RAISING AND LOWERING THEIR HEART BEATS AT WILL.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vagus nerve is\nresponsible for controlling the heart rate via electrical impulses to the\nsinoatrial node of the heart, where acetylcholine release slows the pulse.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nway doctors determine the \u201ctone\u201d or \u201cstrength\u201d of your vagus nerve (and your\ncardiac health) is by measuring the time between your individual heart beats,\nand then plotting this on a chart over time. This is your \u201cheart rate\nvariability.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The longest of the\ncranial nerves, the vagus nerve is so named because it \u201cwanders\u201d like a\nvagabond, sending out fibers from your brainstem to your visceral organs. The\nvagus nerve is literally the captain of your inner nerve center\u2014the\nparasympathetic nervous system, to be specific.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And like a good captain, it\ndoes a great job of overseeing a vast range of crucial functions, communicating\nnerve impulses to every organ in your body. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogis never fell sick because they knew which\nsection of the Vagus nerve they must stimulate to make the brain produce a\nnatural drug ( without side effects ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a vast network of\nfibers stationed like spies around all your organs, when the vagus nerve gets\nwind of the hallmarks of inflammation\u2014cytokines or the inflammatory substance\ntumor necrosis factor (TNF)\u2014it alerts the brain and elicits anti-inflammatory\nneurotransmitters via the cholinergic anti-inflammatory pathway<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogis do not get\nAlzhiemers . &nbsp;&nbsp;Stimulating the vagus\nnerve, which releases the neurotransmitter norepinephrine into the amygdala,\nconsolidating memories. The neurotransmitter acetylcholine, elicited by the\nvagus nerve, literally gives you the breath of life by telling your lungs to\nbreathe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s one of the reasons that botox\u2014often used cosmetically\u2014can be\npotentially dangerous, because it interrupts your acetylcholine production. Botox\nis a toxic substance that has the power to damage the nervous system and shut\ndown the vagus causing death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your ever-vigilant\nsympathetic nervous system revs up the fight or flight responses\u2014pouring the\nstress hormone cortisol and adrenaline into your body\u2014the vagus nerve tells your\nbody to chill out by releasing acetylcholine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its tendrils extend to many\norgans, acting like fiberoptic cables that send instructions to release enzymes\nand proteins like prolactin, vasopressin, and oxytocin, which calm you down.\nPeople with a stronger vagus response recover more quickly after stress,\ninjury, or illness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This paper concluded\nthat \u201cOne of 5 Ayurvedic HMPs produced in South Asia and available in Boston\nSouth Asian grocery stores contains potentially harmful levels of lead,\nmercury, and/or arsenic. Users of Ayurvedic medicine may be at risk for heavy\nmetal toxicity, and testing of Ayurvedic HMPs for toxic heavy metals should be\nmandatory.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The paper sparked off a\nhuge halla-gulla in the US, about how Ayurveda is \u2018mumbo-jumbo\u2019, and how India\nis poisoning innocent American citizens with toxic metals, etc, etc. More\n\u2018scientific\u2019 papers were published on the same theme, raving and ranting\nagainst Ayurveda and calling for an outright ban in the US.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India-bashing is not\nnew in the US. &nbsp;But &nbsp;they used JUDAS Pickle John &nbsp;Indians ( payroll of EVIL PHARMA )\nto run down India and 6200 year old Ayurveda.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4536017635967534947\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_141M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />December 29, 2017 at 5:18 AM<br /><br />BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA--<br /><br />FULL MOON DAY ( POORNIMA ) AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br /><br />AND ..<br /><br />NEW MOON DAY ( AMAVASYA ) -- AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br /><br />WERE HOLIDAYS --FOR FASTING ..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br /><br />SIX FIXED HOLIDAYS IN A MONTH\u2026<br /><br />IF YOU DO THIS TODAY IN MODERN TIMES--AND EAT ORGANIC FOOD , YOU WILL NOT GET CANCER..<br /><br />WHEN THE EVIL WHITE INVADER-- BASTARD-- CAME TO INDIA-- HE MADE US WORSE THAN MONKEYS BY MAKING US FAST ON WRONG MEANINGLESS DATES ..<br /><br />BY 1947 JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE MUTTS IN INDIA. \u2026 HE MADE THE PONTIFFS OF THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS CRYPTO JEWS WITH PALE EYES --STOPPING THE 4000 YEAR OLD TRADITION OK KERALA NAMBOODIRIS HEADING THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS ..<br /><br />THE POST ABOVE IS THE REPEAT THE MOST IMPORTANT FOR 1.1 BILLION HINDUS ON THIS PLANET..<br /><br />SPRING TIDES ARE STRONGEST THREE DAYS-- REPEAT ---THREE DAYS AFTER FULL MOON AND NEW MOON..<br /><br />Tides are long-period waves that roll around the planet as the ocean is \"pulled\" back and forth by the gravitational pull of the moon and the sun as these bodies interact with the Earth in their monthly and yearly orbits\u2026<br /><br />During full or new moons\u2014which occur when the Earth, sun, and moon are nearly in alignment\u2014average tidal ranges are slightly larger. ..This occurs twice each month. ..<br /><br />The moon appears new (dark) when it is directly between the Earth and the sun. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br /><br />Spring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br /><br />Spring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br /><br />http://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br /><br />IN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br /><br />THREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br /><br />THE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br /><br />JEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. HE CUT THEM OFF CULTURALLY FROM INDIA BY INTRODUCING FAKE FESTIVALS AT FAKE DATES ..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br /><br />IF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS NOT BORN ON THIS PLANET..-- HINDUS WOULD HAVE NEVER EVER KNOW ABOUT THIS HUMONGOUS DECEIT\u2026 THIS IS WHY I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ..<br /><br />HUMAN BODY AND BRAIN IS FULL OF WATER --AND SPRING TIDES AFFECT US..<br /><br />Water covers 70 percent of Earth\u2019s surface, makes up 66% of the human body. Sanyal,\nthe then Solicitor General of India, was appointed by the Government of India\nto review and suggest modifications in the law of contempt of court.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">The\nCommittee in its report said the summary jurisdiction to punish for contempt of\ncourt trenches upon two most important fundamental rights, namely, personal\nliberty and freedom of speech and expression, rights which are of vital\nimportance in any democratic system and the law should be viewed mainly from\nthat standpoint. \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">The power to punish for contempt was\nnecessary to \u201csecure public respect and confidence in the judicial\nprocess\u201d--but in India WE THE PEOPLE who are supreme , do NOT have the respect\nanymore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">We must bring back the JURY SYSTEM which was\nabolished after justice was hijacked by RK Karanjia to save a fellow Parsi naval\ncommander Nanavati, who killed his white wife's lover Ahuja--which also catapulted\nthe lawyer of Ahuja Ram Jethmalani to the national stage . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..<br />\n<br />\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<br />\n<br />\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. It costs money to operate all these new\nagencies and enforce all these new rules \u2014 over 225 new rules across a total of\n11 federal agencies, to be exact \u2014 and that money will come from taxpayers. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iNqCnKWWL2E/WCUDtsRKpMI/AAAAAAABO8g/n3KPKGT-Lw0kLlqPv941b_ipKChUYVvdgCLcB/s1600/do887dd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"227\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iNqCnKWWL2E/WCUDtsRKpMI/AAAAAAABO8g/n3KPKGT-Lw0kLlqPv941b_ipKChUYVvdgCLcB/s400/do887dd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The complex Dodd Frank BULLSHIT&nbsp; will take several years in the fixing. &nbsp;&nbsp;It will take years before the full\nimplications of the Dodd-Frank Act become clear to Hilly Billy yanks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd Frank BAFFLE WITH\nBULLSHIT has increased uncertainty for American businesses and hindered their\nability to promote economic growth and create jobs.&nbsp; The worst thing about Dodd-Frank is the\nmisguided effort to remove risk from the system.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DopMnxIVVTA/WCT_SbkTlYI/AAAAAAABO7o/ycwth7GOJwIkpZRgE65SoWpx822S0JWVwCLcB/s1600/147554488EE78_474fe20e89_h.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DopMnxIVVTA/WCT_SbkTlYI/AAAAAAABO7o/ycwth7GOJwIkpZRgE65SoWpx822S0JWVwCLcB/s640/147554488EE78_474fe20e89_h.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Risk is essential to the capital formation\nprocess. Empowering the government to reduce risk in the system will inevitably\nincrease compliance costs and decrease investor returns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd-Frank directed the\nFederal Reserve Board to slash so-called swipe fees that banks charge merchants\nfor debit card use, which bring in $20 billion of annual revenue. While an\ninitial Fed proposal would have capped the fees at 12 cents per transaction,\ndown from the existing average of 44 cents, the regulator had set it at 21 to\n24 cents per transaction in the face of furious lobbying by Rothschild\u2019s banks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government price controls over debit cards is the worst part of complex\nDodd-Frank\u2014which does not DAZZLE WITH BRILLIANCE .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1PjwdK61EOI/WCT_oVdw-1I/AAAAAAABO7s/fIke9phEZwwCfKsQk-TLUJTXcaaoSd0dACLcB/s1600/fqj68mi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1PjwdK61EOI/WCT_oVdw-1I/AAAAAAABO7s/fIke9phEZwwCfKsQk-TLUJTXcaaoSd0dACLcB/s640/fqj68mi.jpg\" width=\"536\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law not only established\nnew regulators, it shifted the lines of authority, forcing institutions to\nreport and be accountable to multiple different federal agencies. The biggest\nfailure of Dodd-Frank is what it neglected to address. Mortgage industry giants\ncontrolled by Rothschild , which were at the epicenter of the crisis, continue\nto dominate the housing finance market.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The government guarantees or owns some\n90 percent of existing home loans. There's no consensus plan to return private\ninvestors to the mortgage market, and very little political will to develop\none.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CtrbcubO_A4/WCT8dErPcJI/AAAAAAABO7E/TJwYZ_YzfagGCLX04jD-NzJdSG4VJ2xQgCLcB/s1600/Woodrow%2BDD7Wilson%2B-%2BFED%2BQuote.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DODD FRANK SHIT IS\nA TOTAL FAILURE.&nbsp; ZIONIST JEWS HAVE SUNG\nALL THE WAY TO THE BANK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law has crushed ONLY\nsmall banks ( which does not affect the Zionist Jews ) &nbsp;restricted access to credit, and planted the\nseeds of financial instability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is now six years since\nRothschild\u2019s puppet President Obama\u2019s signed Dodd-Frank law, the most sweeping\nrewrite of the country\u2019s financial laws.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Obama told the country that the\nlegislation would \u201clift the US economy.\u2014<b style=\"background-color: lime;\">BALLS !&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Too-big-to-fail\ninstitutions have not disappeared. Big banks are bigger, small banks are fewer,\nand the financial system is less stable. Meanwhile, the economy remains in the\ndoldrums. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd-Frank was based on\nthe premise that the financial crisis was the result of deregulation. <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BALLS YET\nAGAIN. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It wasn\u2019t deregulation that\ncaused the crisis, it was dumb regulation&nbsp;\n( cunning regulation for Zionist Jews who are only interested in profits\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Among the dumbest were Washington\u2019s\naffordable-housing mandates, beginning in 1977, that led to a loosening of\nunderwriting standards and put people into homes they couldn\u2019t afford.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
