font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nFederal Reserve played its part in the 2008 financial crisis by keeping\ninterest rates too low for too long, inflating the housing bubble. Washington\nnot only failed to prevent the crisis, it led not so bright Yanks into it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9o3ciUxsxhw/WCT7XVmYUXI/AAAAAAABO64/pUS4fpEHMzE0CE3RR5NmpKovsQ7C8drfACLcB/s1600/imagFes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9o3ciUxsxhw/WCT7XVmYUXI/AAAAAAABO64/pUS4fpEHMzE0CE3RR5NmpKovsQ7C8drfACLcB/s400/imagFes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd-Frank was\nsupposedly aimed at Wall Street, but it hit Main Street hard. Community\nfinancial institutions, which make the bulk of small business loans, are still overwhelmed\nby the law\u2019s DELIBERATE complexity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rFJppqHLOKY/WCUEm8OkCdI/AAAAAAABO8o/k2gvxlDR8XI9xq-OCtCPb5BpaA4AyGfvACLcB/s1600/FreeThoughtProjectFarRemovedFromMiddleClass-postedMMMNManufacturedHousingIndustryDailyBusinessNewsMHProNews.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"441\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rFJppqHLOKY/WCUEm8OkCdI/AAAAAAABO8o/k2gvxlDR8XI9xq-OCtCPb5BpaA4AyGfvACLcB/s640/FreeThoughtProjectFarRemovedFromMiddleClass-postedMMMNManufacturedHousingIndustryDailyBusinessNewsMHProNews.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Dodd-Frank, 77%\nof banks offered free checking. Two years after it passed, only 37% did so\u2014a\ntrend various scholars have attributed to Dodd-Frank\u2019s \u201cDurbin amendment,\u201d which\nimposed price controls on the fee paid by retailers when consumers use a debit\ncard.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bank fees have also increased due to Dodd-Frank, leading to a rise of the\nunbanked and underbanked among low- and moderate-income Americans.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ni2Pxc0tXPY/WCT9pXflt7I/AAAAAAABO7U/pKXzmZfcmj0GOZJUY87_s0rBZ_0CMvHtQCLcB/s1600/rothschilds-infaEESmous-let-me-issue-control-money-quote-end-the-fed.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of Dodd-Frank,\nfinancial markets will have less capacity to deal with shocks and are more\nlikely to seize up in a panic. &nbsp;This EVIL\nLAW will be the source of the next financial crisis from which Rothschild and\nhis agents will again laugh all the way to the kosher vaults.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd-Frank\u2019s scheme for\nregulating derivatives markets concentrates systemic risks into clearinghouses\nand then designates the clearinghouses as too big to fail. Dodd-Frank\u2019s\n\u201corderly liquidation authority\u201d enshrines taxpayer-funded bailouts into law.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oHz9c0nGmgQ/WCYKphGQGjI/AAAAAAABPCU/aic_iNhAOAQrFYXfQEj5yQdEsKTaIgH6wCLcB/s1600/too-big-pig-to-fail-moffffrin-miami-herald.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"410\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oHz9c0nGmgQ/WCYKphGQGjI/AAAAAAABPCU/aic_iNhAOAQrFYXfQEj5yQdEsKTaIgH6wCLcB/s640/too-big-pig-to-fail-moffffrin-miami-herald.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, the Fed, by keeping interest rates too low for too long, is\nintroducing dangerous imbalances into financial markets and is likely inflating\nasset bubbles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is most disturbing\nabout Dodd-Frank is the authority it gives SHADOW GOVT CONTROLLED &nbsp;bureaucrats to control huge swaths of US\neconomy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mDAgpftg9nA/WCT7Ipf_1WI/AAAAAAABO60/zO-UvvkZ-Hc1_-5h9l8rC9VtUwk3eSBcwCLcB/s1600/imE777ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"416\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mDAgpftg9nA/WCT7Ipf_1WI/AAAAAAABO60/zO-UvvkZ-Hc1_-5h9l8rC9VtUwk3eSBcwCLcB/s640/imE777ages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd-Frank requires\nthat bank holding companies worth $50 billion or more must submit a \u201cliving will\u201d\nto the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. and the Fed. This \u201cwill\u201d is a detailed\nplan for how the company will cope in case of severe financial problems. If the\nplan is not to the regulators\u2019 liking, they can require the company to\nrestructure, raise capital, divest or downsize.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cheightened\nprudential supervision\u201d Dodd-Frank allows the Rothschild owned Fed to exercise\nover \u201csystemically important\u201d banks essentially places them under government\ncontrol. Soon the Fed will exercise effective control over the largest insurance\ncompanies and asset managers as well.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: As an expert in DOMINO change management I know when I see a CHOOT agenda.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LONG AGO, I MET A YOUNG DUTCH SHIPOWNER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HE WANTED TO KNOW HOW HIS PET COMPUTER\nSOFTWARE SYSTEM IS \u2013COMPREHENSIVE SOFTWARE , WHICH WAS ALL INCLUSIVE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I ASKED HIM\u2014\u201c YOU REALLY WANT TO KNOW?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HE REPLIED\u2014\u201c I HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT CAPT\nVADAKAYIL WILL BE THE BEST MAN TO COMMENT ON IT \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I SPAKE \u201c THIS SOFTWARE IS SO COMPLEX WITH SO\nMANY VIEWING WINDOWS , WITH SO MANY FLIPPING SHEETS \u2014 THE HUMAN BRAIN IS NOT\nEQUIPPED TO HANDLE THIS VISUAL LOAD \u2013 THE BRAIN LIKES TO SEE IN A BIRDs EYE\nVIEW \u2013 YOUR TOP MANAGERS IN YOUR COMPANY ARE ROBBING YOU BLIND . &nbsp;&nbsp;YOU ARE BLEEDING BUCKETS FROM YOUR FUCKIN\u2019 ASSHOLE\nAND YOU ARE NOT EVEN AWARE.\u201c</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8ndMhngKlNs/WCT8rQ33UKI/AAAAAAABO7I/G1IUv9YVz-Uao_0cqyLOJtuF9HImwJkIgCLcB/s1600/im338ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">American Action Forum released a study\nanalyzing the overwhelming costs of the legislation; $24 billion in final rule\ncosts and 61 million paperwork burden hours.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-d_NOcrm50zE/WCUGzXuXfqI/AAAAAAABO84/tftjznOafq4dOLJDg9KqMLKjGH5bFNgIgCLcB/s1600/im44ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-noMOk_n8bxw/WCUGeRZWyNI/AAAAAAABO80/GKB92Rz3FGIRAKGbahQIaFMvko6D0-D1wCLcB/s1600/Tapeworm-insEEEEide-intestine.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dodd-Frank Act has\nreduced consumer choice, while driving consumer costs and the compliance burden\nhigher. Dodd-Frank Act has proven a failure on all accounts, as consumer\nchoice, credit unions, and small banks are being phased out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even more alarming is\nthe fact that not all provisions of the Dodd-Frank Act have been enacted, and\nthere are still at least 61 rulemakings remaining within the Dodd-Frank Act.\nThese rules, still in proposed form, are slated to be finalized soon and only\nadd to the already massive compliance costs and burden. Combined, the\nDodd-Frank Act rulemakings still yet to be finalized would add another $3.3\nbillion in additional costs and almost one million more hours of paperwork.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KIUNzGY1KAU/WCYLJeWVQtI/AAAAAAABPCc/7O7ML-6TIjMhdUV3DwBnSzgp-o3iBqIfwCLcB/s1600/imayyges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AT SEA ON SHIPS I\nCOMMANDED I SHUNNED EXCESSIVE PAPERWORK \u2013 MERE ACTIVITY TRAPS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I CONCENTRATED ON\nTRAFFIC AHEAD OF MY SHIP\u2014NOT DOCUMENTING AND ANALYSING FISHING BOATS AND SHIPS\nBEHIND MY SHIPs WAKE,&nbsp; IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE\nFOR ME TO MAKE IDIOT BOSSES UNDERSTAND<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%;\">IN MORE OLDEN DAYS DID\nA TOP MANAGER EVER SIT LIKE A RETARDED MONKEY BETWEEN A TELEX MACHINE AND A FAX MACHINE \u2013GAPING\nAT THE PRINTERS OF EACH AT TEN SECOND INTERVALS?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/real-work-and-activity-traps-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/real-work-and-activity-traps-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4rZtcVurgBo/WCULpvi6MEI/AAAAAAABO9M/R6oy96zkS00MsnhN_9zXgUvBVxaZss8ogCLcB/s1600/dowDDnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4rZtcVurgBo/WCULpvi6MEI/AAAAAAABO9M/R6oy96zkS00MsnhN_9zXgUvBVxaZss8ogCLcB/s640/dowDDnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NAFTA has created a\ncommon trading market between the United States , Mexico, and Canada .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The North American Free\nTrade Agreement, NAFTA, is a much criticized and praised trilateral agreement\nsigned by Mexico,Canada and the United States, in 1993. It came into force on 1\nJanuary 1994 and its goal was to eliminate trade barriers and promote economic\nexchanges between the three North American countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NAFTA has weaknesses.\nNAFTA made it possible for many U.S. manufacturers to move jobs to lower-cost\nMexico. The manufacturers that remained in America lowered their wages to\ncompete in those industries. The US trade deficit with Mexico has risen since\nNAFTA began<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Products assembled in\nMexico are imported tariff-free into the United States under NAFTA. The same\nproduct assembled in the United States would pay duties on the imported parts,\nwhich would be more costly for the producer. That\u2019s what has been deterring US\nproducers from shifting their manufacturing bases from Mexico back into the\nUnited States.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BASTARD JUDAS PRESSTITUTE MEDIA</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WHEN HILLARY CALLED TRUMP SUPPORTERS DEPLORABLES , THEY HAD NO PROBLEM,</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BUT WHEN TRUMP CALLED THE QUEEN OF ANAL PORN ( ALICIA MACHADO ) PIGGY --THE SKY FELL DOWN, RIGHT ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; He has now been dropped like a hot potato \u2013ostensibly\n? &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Three months ago\nSaurabh baby was dropped from the new ministry sworn in under chief minister\nVijay Rupani.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CHECK OUT MY EXPERIENCE WITH ADANI GROUP--</b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/my-experience-at-mundra-port-adani-sez.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/my-experience-at-mundra-port-adani-sez.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">DO AMBANIS HAVE BIGGER\nBANK LOANS THAN VIJAY MALLYA ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WE KNOW !<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHY IS THERE ZERO\nTRANSPARENCY ?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/kleptocracy-in-india-lobbying-pimping.html\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/kleptocracy-in-india-lobbying-pimping.html</b></span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Under attack for appointing his own family members in state public sector enterprises, Kerala Industries Minister EP Jayarajan today resigned from the post.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Jayarajan, a close aide of Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and the number two in the cabinet, is among one of the most powerful leaders of the Communist Party of India-Marxist (CPI-M) in Kerala.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CPI-M state secretary Kodiyeri Balakrishnan made the announcement, saying Jayarajan himself decided to step down.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\"He asked for permission in the Secretariat meeting following the mistake he committed. He was very particular about the image of the party and the government,\" Balakrishnan told the media.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\"He sought permission to resign and he resigned,\" said Balakrishnan.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The news of Jayarajan appointing his relatives surfaced 10 days ago, triggering a volley of criticism against the Left Democratic Front (LDF) government which took power only four months ago.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The Congress-led UDF and the BJP approached the Vigilance Department to seek a probe and demanded the minister's ouster.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">According to CPI-M sources, Jayarajan did his best to explain his case at the meeting of the 14-member Secretariat of the party.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But Vijayan was in no mood to relent as the central leadership of the party had taken Jayarajan's action as a serious lapse.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">One of the two relatives in the controversy is P.K. Sudheer, son of CPI-M Lok Sabha member P.K. Sreemathy. He is a nephew of Jayarajan. The other person is a niece of the minister, Dipthi Nishad.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Neither Sudheer (appointed Managing Director of the Kerala State Industrial Enterprises Ltd) nor Nishad (named General Manager of the Kerala Clay and Ceramics Ltd) had the experience or qualifications for the job.</span></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: droid_serifregular; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Following a huge outcry, both quit their posts.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6158649154046542084\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_46M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BEFORE 7000 BC INDIA RULED BOTH NORTH AND\nSOUTH AMERICAS \u2013GIVING \u2013NEVER TAKING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEACH AMERICAN SCHOOL CHILDREN TRUE HISTORY \u2013NOT\nSLANTED ONES WRITTEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WARNING :&nbsp;&nbsp;\nALL SPANISH &nbsp;SPEAKING MEXICANS ARE\nNOT ILLEGAL ALIENS IN AMERICA . <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THIS IS THEIR ANCIENT SACRED LAND WHERE THEIR\nANCESTORS WERE BORN .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mexican Cession (529,000 sq. miles) was a\n&nbsp;large acquisition of Mexican territory &nbsp;by America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">is the peace treaty signed on February 2,\n1848, in the Villa de Guadalupe Hidalgo (now a neighborhood of Mexico City)\nbetween the United States and Mexico that ended the Mexican\u2013American War\n(1846\u201348).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the defeat of its army and the fall of\nits capital, Mexico entered into negotiations to end the war. It gave the\nUnited States the Rio Grande as a boundary for Texas, and gave the U.S.\nownership of California and a large area comprising roughly half of New Mexico,\nmost of Arizona, Nevada, Utah, and parts of Wyoming and Colorado. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Mexicans in those annexed areas had the\nchoice of relocating to within Mexico's new boundaries or receiving American\ncitizenship with full civil rights.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Over 90% chose to become U.S. citizens. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mexico gained\nindependence from Spain in 1821 after ending years of war against colonial\nimposition and crimes by the Spanish invaders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The war left Mexico drained out\nwhich contributed to neglect its Northern territories known today as the United\nStates \u201cSouthwest.\u201d The original name of that land is Aztlan and Chicano\ndescendants from the original inhabitants still use that name today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While Mexico was at war\nwith Spain, thousands of white colonists, cattleman, adventures, and\nmercenaries, were coming from other parts of North America that had been\nalready invaded and occupied looking for land and gold they could find and\nobtain \u201cby any means.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These mercenaries fixed their eyes and interest in what\nis today \u201cTexas,\u201d placed themselves in land plots, and later enlarged their\npopulation so that by 1835 there were more white foreigners than native Mexicans\nin the area.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1836 the white\nforeigners occupied most of the territory by force, declared \u201cindependence\u201d and\ncalled the stolen lands \u201cRepublic of Texas.\u201d This bandit\u2019s act caused the war\nbetween Mexico and the United States for the first time until the Treaty of\nGuadalupe Hidalgo was signed between the two countries on February 2, 1848.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mexico lost the land the whites called \u201cTexas\u201d but subsequently the rest of the\nNorthern territories which eventually became part of the whole mass land known\ntoday as the US \u201cSouthwest.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The land stolen from\nMexico is bigger than Germany and France combined and considered to be among\nthe riches in the world where an abundance of gold was found after the Treaty\nof Guadalupe Hidalgo was signed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The native Mexicans were forced to become US\ncitizens or leave the area one year after the Treaty was signed. As a result of\nthe invader\u2019s laws, thousands of native Mexicans left but the great majority\nstayed and became citizens.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout the development of the so-called\n\u201cRepublic of Texas\u201d the war against Mexicans was made of grave crimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KILL ALL MEXICANS AND\nTAKE MEXICO WAS THE WHITE MANs WAR CRY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">History has registered\nthousands of grotesque crimes against Mexicans in that part of the Native\nAmerican Continent, but more outstanding for having similarities with the grave\ncrimes by whites in Central and South America, are those related to the taken\nof men by force of arms out of their homes to be murdered, then the white\nkillers would back to the homes and rape women and little girls, murder them,\nset the homes on fire, and kill all the animals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mexicans used to refer\nto whites who committed the crimes as \u201cdrunken bandits, fornicators, devils\nvomited from hell, and monsters who defy the laws of nature; they are white men\nwith dirty beards, ignorant, shameless, stinking, with their hats thrown\ntowards the back, thirsty for the wish of stealing our lands and wealth, and\nfor raping our beautiful young ladies.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That reference is still valid today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tthe massacres\nthroughout the \u2018Texas\u2019 border was truly incredible, as most whites had turned\ninto cold blooded killers totally degenerate spreading terror all along the\nterritory killing people only because they were Mexicans, calling them \u2018stupid\ngreasers\u2019 before murdering them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most incredible\ncrimes were committed against Mexicans by white men, while no punishment was\nimposed on the killers for their crimes since a judge or jury would not dare to\ncondemn whites for murdering Mexicans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mexico refused to\nbecome a member of the League of Nations arguing that the written agreements\ndid not provided with guarantees on racial equality between whites and\nMexicans. The documents were declared to be racist</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1848 the North of Mexico became the\n\u201csouthwest\u201d of the US<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE\nBLACKS NEVER WANTED TO COME TO AMERICA<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THEY\nWERE DRAGGED DOWN HERE AS SLAVES BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THEY\nHAVE A RIGHT TO BE IN AMERICA.&nbsp; IF BLACKS\nBELONG TO AFRICA, WHITES BELONG TO EUROPE</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p4NIlz2EMH4/WCWB4hN4WwI/AAAAAAABO-8/2v__7d57T24utUtPVwFvPMVpYb3BtA2kQCLcB/s1600/slfffide_28.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p4NIlz2EMH4/WCWB4hN4WwI/AAAAAAABO-8/2v__7d57T24utUtPVwFvPMVpYb3BtA2kQCLcB/s640/slfffide_28.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Teach this in US school\nbooks . Until 1848 California, New Mexico and other portions of the Southwest\nwere internationally recognized provinces of free Mexico, until the U.S.\ndecided it wanted those provinces, declared war on Mexico, and stole them<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Read on for the\nchronology of these events, and then ask yourself&nbsp; : \"Who are the real illegal in\nCalifornia?\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Prior to 1822&nbsp;&nbsp;  What is today Mexico, Texas, Arizona, New\nMexico, Colorado, Utah, and California are all Spanish colonies.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1822&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mexican colonists, following the American\nrevolution, rebel against Spain and win their own revolutionary war, making\nMexico a free nation just like America.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1844&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; James Polk campaigns for the U.S.\npresidency, supporting expansion of U.S. territories into Mexico.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">February, 1845&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; James Polk, on his inagauguration\nnight, confides to his Secretary of the Navy that a principal objective of his\npresidency is the acquisition of California, which Mexico had been refusing to\nsell to the U.S. at any price.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Early 1845&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Washington Union, expressing the\nposition of James Polk, writes: \"...who can arrest the torrent that will\npour onward to the West? The road to California will be open to us. Who will\nstay the march...?\" \"A corps of properly organized volunteers...would\ninvade, overrun, and occupy Mexico. They would enable us not only to take\nCalifornia, but to keep it.\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Early 1845&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;  John O'Sullivan, editor of the\nDemocratic review writes it is \"Our manifest destiny to overspread the\ncontinent ...for the free development of our yearly multiplying millions.\"\n<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Early 1845&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; James Polk promises Texas he will support\nmoving the historical Texas/Mexico border at the Nueces river 150 miles south\nto the Rio Grande provided Texas agrees to join the union. \"The\ntraditional border between Texas and Mexico had been the Nueces River...and\nboth the United States and Mexico had recognized that as the border.\"\n(Zinn, p. 148) <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">June 30, 1845&nbsp; James Polk orders troops to march south of the\ntraditional Texas/Mexico border into Mexican inhabited territory, causing\nMexicans to flee their villages and abandon their crops in terror. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Ordering troops\nto the Rio Grande, into territory inhabited by Mexicans, was clearly a\nprovocation.\" (Zinn, p. 148) <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"President Polk\nhad incited war by sending American soldiers into what was disputed territory,\nhistorically controlled and inhabited by Mexicans.\" (John Schroeder ,\n\"Mr. Polk's War\")<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Early 1846&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Colonel\nHitchcock, commander of the 3rd Infantry regiment, writes in his diary:\n\"...the United States are the aggressors....We have not one particle of\nright to be here....It looks as if the government sent a small force on purpose\nto bring on a war, so as to have a pretext for taking California and as much of\nthis country as it chooses....My heart is not in this business.\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">May 9, 1846&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; President Polk tells his cabinet:\n\"...up to this time...we have heard of no open aggression by the Mexican\nArmy.\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">May 10, 1846&nbsp; Violence erupts between Mexican and American\ntroops south of the Nueces River. Of course Polk claims Mexicans had fired the\nfirst shot, but in his famous \"spot resolutions\" congressman Abraham\nLincoln repeatedly challenges president Polk to name the exact \"spot\"\nwhere Mexicans first attacked American troops. Polk never met the challenge. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">May 11, 1846&nbsp; President Polk urges congress to declare war\non Mexico. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">May 12, 1846&nbsp; : Horace Greeley writes in the New York\nTribune: \"We can easily defeat the armies of Mexico, slaughter them by\nthousands, and pursue them perhaps to their capital; we can conquer and\n\"annex\" their territory; but what then? Who believes that a score of\nvictories over Mexico, the \"annexation\" of half of her provinces,\nwill give us more Liberty, a purer Morality, a more prosperous Industry...? <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1846&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Congressman Abraham Lincoln, speaking in a session\nof congress \"...the president unnecessarily and unconstitutionally\ncommenced a war with Mexico....The marching an army into the midst of a\npeaceful Mexican settlement, frightening the inhabitants away, leaving their\ngrowing crops and other property to destruction, to you may appear a perfectly\namiable, peaceful, un- provoking procedure; but it does not appear so to\nus.\"&nbsp;</span></i></span><i style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;after war is underway, the American press\ncomments:</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">February 11, 1847. The\n\"Congressional Globe\" reports: \"...We must march from ocean to\nocean....We must march from Texas straight to the Pacific ocean....It is the\ndestiny of the white race, it is the destiny of the Anglo-Saxon Race.\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The New York Herald:\n\"The universal Yankee Nation can regenerate and disenthrall the people of\nMexico in a few years; and we believe it is a part of our destiny to civilize\nthat beautiful country.\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">American Review writes\nof Mexicans \"yielding to a superior population, insensibly oozing into her\nterritories, changing her customs, and out-living, exterminating her weaker\nblood.\" <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1846-1848&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; U.S. Army battles Mexico, not just\nenforcing the new Texas border at the Rio Grande but capturing Arizona, New\nMexico, Utah, Colorado, and California (as well as marching as far south as\nMexico City). <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1848&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;  Mexico surrenders on U.S. terms (U.S. takes\nover ownership of New Mexico, California, an expanded Texas, and more, for a\ntoken payment of $15 million, which leads the Whig Intelligencer to report:\n\"We take nothing by conquest....Thank God\").<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E7FC7GNNaXE/WCWBf_8AEhI/AAAAAAABO-4/VfWcY01iPYAGaLzkOE6sL01iuZ6tF6lRgCLcB/s1600/Reclaiming-Stolen-Bireeethright-map-1.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"488\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E7FC7GNNaXE/WCWBf_8AEhI/AAAAAAABO-4/VfWcY01iPYAGaLzkOE6sL01iuZ6tF6lRgCLcB/s640/Reclaiming-Stolen-Bireeethright-map-1.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>General Ulysses S. Grant calls the\nMexican War \"the most unjust war ever undertaken by a stronger nation\nagainst a weaker one.\"<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aST8r_NApLs/WCWC7JsD2KI/AAAAAAABO_E/J5JBtMKkiEsdNIEGfNPcsKbcZ8ZFR5uyACLcB/s1600/Soutddhwest.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\">DONALD TRUMP</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE INITIATE TO QUELL THE RIOTS HAS TO COME FROM YOU-- DO IT NOW !</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOT FROM OBAMA AND HILLARY -- THIS PATHETIC DUO IS ENJOYING !</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
